name: Andrea Brown
text: The owners and staff went out of their way to make our dogs feel at home! We were so pleased that we booked additional boardings! Stop by and check them out!

resp.text: Coco and Tycho were well behaved house guest and a joy to have spent time with those sweet fur babies!  Looking forward to to our next visit.

name: Jennifer Smith
text: I have a very unruly almost 100 lb doodle that thinks he is a 5 lb puppy! These kind people take care of him from Kaitlyn who is an awesome person who cares for his hair and nails etc. to Tim and his wife. Time has taken an interest in my doodle and currently trying to help me break his male aggressive tendencies. These people are wonderful, economical, sweet and friendly and truly care about the pets under their care! The place is exceptionally clean and I have boarded my demanding dog there one time and going for round two this weekend. They care for him when he is not able because of his behavior to join us on our camping trips or other activities. I highly recommend them to anyone needing to have their pet taken care of you will not be disappointed.

resp.text: Hi Jennifer,  thank you so much for taking the time to provide feedback. We are so delighted that you rate our service as 5 star as we strive to provide just that for all our customers. We always look forward to seeing you and Clifford!!!

name: Christopher George
text: A little off the beaten path(for me but that's my problem and definitely worth the drive) but I HIGHLY RECOMMEND.  Ms. Kacy took great care of my pup!! Shaped him up nicely so he won't be so hot on the hiking trails. Bath and de-shed definitely helped with his shedding. Will definitely be back!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words, Christopher. We really appreciate you taking the time out to share your experience with us—and we agree, Ms. Kayce is truly a gem to have on our team! We count ourselves lucky for customers like you. We look forward to seeing you guys again in the future!

name: Matthew Christopher
text: Nice folks that run this place..5 star miss clicked great place

name: Amy Foster
text: My dog, Lucy, has been going here for a little over 2 months. She RUNS to them ready to start her day! She comes home tired and I can tell she’s had a great time. The dogs have plenty of space to run and a clean facility to relax in between play time.

resp.text: Amy, thanks so much for giving us your take on how we are doing. We're glad that customers like you are having a great experience at K-9 Bath Body & Boarding. We absolutely love Lucy and miss her when she is not with us.

text: My little guy, Sonny, has been going to daycare twice a week here!!!!  He is SO excited to get there and so exhausted when he leaves!! We're happy that you're happy, and we're looking forward to your next visit.

Hurry back!

name: Elizabeth Neumann
text: Our puppy Wesley absolutely loves his time at K-9’s Doggy Day Care. We’ve utilized the service twice now and will definitely be going back. resp.text:

We are incredibly grateful that you took the time out to leave us a 5-Star review.

text: We boarded our puppy there recently the staff was excellent!  They treated him like he was their own dog.  He was well groomed and happy when we picked him up!  Kennels are very clean with wide open spaces to play.  Definitely a repeat customer.

text: The owners are so nice and very informative, they treat your dog like their own. My dog Riley comes here multiple times a week for daycare and loves it! She gets excited the second we pull up and is worn out when she leaves (love that part)! Highly recommend!

resp.text: Meagan, thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience at K-9 Bath Body & Boarding. We take pride in knowing our customers are happy with their experience.We love Riley and look forward to seeing her every week!!

name: Brandon Jennings

name: Annya Plotkina
text: My dog Maya loved her stay  with Petz Pack so much that she didn't want to come home. Petz Pack will take care of your fur baby like he/she is their own. I definently will use them for the future boarding. Highly recommend.

name: Jamie Russell
text:
I have been friends with Michael and Melissa Cox for years now, but up until this weekend, I have not had the pleasure of doing business with Petz Pack.

They took the very best care of our sweet Roo. I cannot say enough about how awesome they were, even to the point of hand-feeding Roo because he wouldn't eat otherwise. They took him in and treated him like he was a part of their own family.

Being able to board Roo in a home instead of in a kennel made me feel so much better about leaving him. He needs all the attention and loves and Mike and Melissa and Wyatt made sure he was the happiest boy while we were away.

If you have a fur baby you know how important it is to be able to leave town and trust your baby is being taken care of the way that Petz Pack does!

name: Nicole Reynolds
text: We just picked up our sweet Dennis from Petz Pack. He was clean and happy 🙂 we also left with some tricks and tips to help out with his spazziness 😂 The owners are dog whisperers. I would not send our sweet boy anywhere else while we are out of town.  Check them out next time you have a family trip and can’t take your animals.

name: Nora Bea
text: Been coming here about 8-months now, very pleased. Very easy check-in & check-out with our dogs. Using the Square app & swipe allows for easy payment right there in the front door. Our adult dogs feel safe, esp since our Pet Host accommodates their crates, pet allergies & feeding schedules.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the positive feedback! Thank you for supporting small, local, family business

name: teresa kendall
text: Shannan and Kyle (at the Willows location) took such great care of our fur kids!  This was Lilly's first time away from home-- from the pictures that we got each day, we were afraid she wasn't going to want to come home!  Thank you for letting us relax on our vacation, confident that our pets were well cared for and pampered!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review! We will always have a loving home for sweet Lilly and BEAU!

name: Carrie Petak
text: I highly recommend Petz pack main.  Mike and his wife took great care of our dog Jasper.  We got daily updates with pictures and Jasper looked like he was having so much fun.  Knowing that he was not stuck at a boarding facility and he could stay at a house with other pups to play with was a great comfort and we were able to enjoy our vacation without any worries.

name: Will Elliott
text: My pups are always so well taken care of

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review!

resp.text: Thank you for the great review!

name: Nathan Payne
text: Great people! Love these folks! I would definitely trust them with my pet's care.

name: Shelbey Hooker
text: Petz Carlton is FANTASTIC. It is not run as an after thought or side gig. Melissa and Mike are professional and run the Petz as passionate entrepreneurs. He's a playful pooch and they sent us lots of pictures and videos of him getting great workouts in their backyard. I would highly recommend the Petz Carlton for any dog.

name: Sue Mason
text: Wish there was one more stars to rate this wonderful couple that treats our pup, Bridget, like she was a part of the family!!!! resp.text: Thank you so much Tami! I really appreciate the kinds words and yes, we LOVE Friends of Rescue!

name: David & Peggy Deutch
text: Great place with a wonderful experience for our furry companion.  We enjoyed the daily updates and pictures and were impressed by the cleanliness of the place.  Our dog cannot wait to go again and we feel very comfortable leaving her.

name: BECKY K
text: We don't know what we would do without Petz Carlton! We can always spend our vacations worry free because of this great company. Our pup's host family has welcomed him in as their own and their home has become his second home. They are super friendly, professional and responsible. I highly recommend Petz Carlton!

resp.text: Thank you Becky! :) Much love to Hatch!

name: Stacey Foster
text: Highly Recommended!! I am very particular about my dog - she is like my child. I fully trust Petz Carlton to keep her and I know she will be taken care of and have a blast!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review!

name: Mark Still
text: Our pup loves his time at Petz Carlton. Watts has stayed at 3 Petz Carlton locations more than one time each and has enjoyed them all --- and we are happy that we have a place for him to stay when he can't be with us where people love him and take good care of him.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review! Hugs to Watts!

name: Joe Martin
text: Petz Carlton is truly your dog's home away from home! It is the only place my wife is comfortable leaving our golden doodle Benny. He's a doodle so you know he's high class and high maintenance. Erin in the south Huntsville location provides service above and beyond for us.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review!

name: jeanette woods
text:
There is no other place I would take my sweet furry baby. I have used 2 of their locations. Travelling has been so much easier and relaxing knowing that my Abby is happy, comfortable, and most of all she doesn't even need her anxiety medication during her stay.
God Bless all of you at Petz Carlyon.!!!!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review!!

name: Sue vonKamp
text: I usually take my fur baby with me but on several occasions, she stayed with Tatiana. More than satisfied. Plus, my Toto is on special food and she has not needed allergy shots when she comes home. So I know what she has eaten.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review!

name: Andrew Yarbrough
text: This is the best place you can leave your dog in the state. We have used them multiple times and never worry about our dog because we know that she is being treated like family at Petz Carlton with Tatiana.

resp.text: Thank you for the amazing review!

name: Kristin Tichawa
text: What a great experience! Fast communication and Adam and Tina were AMAZING! They took such good care of our dog Winston, along with their three furry helpers! We travel a lot and I have never felt better about the care Winston received. We will definitely use The Petz Carlton again and we will recommend them to every one we know!

resp.text: Thank you for the great review Kristin! I will be sure to let our English village location know they are going above and beyond, as expected! Thank you for the feedback and for choosing the Petz Carlton :-)

name: Alice Correa
text: Petz Carlton provides an excellent and personal service for you pets. Knowing that my furbaby is being cared for as part of a family makes my work travel so much less stressful. And she loves her temporary family-she gets excited as soon as we pull up to the house. Very comforting and reassuring.

resp.text: Thanks so much for the great review Alice! We all love Girlie!

name: Teresa Shurtz
text: Our dog, Sandy, has stayed at the Petz Carlton several times now and we always look forward to her next visit.  She enjoys the personal attention, the time playing with other dogs, and the homemade treats.  I love seeing the pictures of Sandy that Melissa posts on FB and the personal attention she gets while staying at the Petz Carlton.  I highly recommend the Petz Carlton!

resp.text: Thank you! We love Sandy, she's such a sweetie!

name: Katie Crawford
text: If you're looking for a place to board your dog worry-free, Petz Carlton at 5 Points is the place for you! We travel often and it makes it so much easier to see how happy he is to see Katelyn and the other 5 Points pups! Copper comes home with us worn out from all the playtime rather than amped up from being in a kennel all day. We could never board anywhere else. Copper is one spoiled pup thanks to Petz Carlton!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review! We enjoy seeing Copper's picture's on the page!

name: Lindsey White
text: I was so nervous to leave my dogs for 8 days. One of my dogs is a little bit of a jerk but these guys know what they are doing and handled it wonderfully. Petz Carlton put me completely at ease. I'm positive my dogs enjoyed my vacation more than I did.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review!

name: Kaki Pierce
text:
Wow! Really... 5 stars doesn't seem like enough.

First things first, we've been visiting Mike & Melissa (Petz Carlton - Main Location) for over a year now. We have also attended Petz Carlton @ Lanier Lakes. We have NEVER EVER had a bad experience at EITHER location.

Mike, Melissa, Tatiana, and Josh are all PERFECT hosts. I always feel 100% confident in leaving our sweet boy. They are all knowledgeable in pet behavior, and they're all trained in the case that an emergency could arise.

The Petz Carlton is around the same price point as a luxury boarding facility, but I can guarantee you that you get MUCH MORE VALUE from the Petz. (Mainly because those boarding facilities can use lots of great words to talk about their services, but they don't live up to their promises.)

Our little buddy will be ALWAYS be a member of the Petz pack! Thanks, Petz Carlton, for all you do!

resp.text: Thank you for the great review!

name: Kelvin Yung
text: The only place we take our pups to. We have used multiple locations of the Pack and had great experiences with all of them. If you are looking for a loving home environment for your fur babies, these guys are it.

name: Cheryl Clay
text: I was really concerned about leaving my dogs, particularly one that has fear issues, but Melissa and Mike are absolutely fantastic!  They truly understand dog behavior and my pups have such a great time.  They get to play with other dogs in a professionally supervised atmosphere where they are safe, and it is great for their socialization. I do not worry about them at all while I am away.  They are always happy to see Melissa and Mike and that tells me all I need to know. I am so glad I found them!

resp.text: Thank you for the great review Cheryl!  Hugs to the boys!

name: Susan Seavers
text: We love taking our dogs to Petz Carlton. Tammy and her family provide excellent care. I was so nervous leaving them, but I got pictures and updates of them playing and interacting with other dogs and family members. It really put my mind at ease. We had booked back to back trips. When we picked our dogs up from the first trip, they were happy to see us, but when we took them back, they couldn't wait to go inside! I knew they were happy!

resp.text: Thank you for the great review!

name: Cindy H. Johnston
text: Petz Carlton is the best pet sitting service ever! Our Westie loves being in the Cox pack of dogs! I always took her laundry basket with towels in it for her to sleep in as she put herself in there when she was a puppy. Mike asked me why I brought my laundry to his house. I said that was Lottie's bed. He said,"Well, she doesn't sleep there when she's here with us." I asked,"Where does she sleep?"  He said,"With us."  No wonder she loves being with Petz Carlton!

resp.text: Lottie Da is AWESOME! Thanks so much for the great review Cindy! :)

name: Kimberly Brown
text: I love being about to go out of town without worrying about where to board my dog and how well they'll care for him. Buck is excited when I drop him off at Petz Carlton and sad to leave when I take him home. I love that they post pictures while I'm gone so I can see what Buck's doing while I'm away. Petz Carlton is the real deal, and they'll treat your pup like their own while you're away!

resp.text: Thank you for the great review Kimberly! :)

name: B. Christine
text: I was introduced to the Petz Carlton 3 yrs ago when I desperately needed to board my two babies-my morkies. They came to my rescue because I WAS NOT boarding my babies in a caged area where they would sleep on the floor and not have the comforts of home! I've only allowed the Petz Carlton to keep my babies because they treat my babies as their own, and that gives me a sense of peace. They are family to me and I will never send my babies anywhere else! They send me pics of my babies so I never worry about how they are doing! Each location I've used  has been wonderful and my babies are always so happy and most importantly WELL LOVED 😍

resp.text: Thank you SO much for the amazing review Barbara! :) We love Asher and Bella so much, they are Petz Carlton Royalty!

name: Troy Schoenfelder
text: Excellent customer service with Petz Carlton.  They learn your needs and what makes your pet happy.  5 Stars!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review! :)

name: Jeffery Hussong
text:
Fabulous company, process with very dedicated and attentive people.
Your dog will feel right at home

resp.text: Thanks Jeff :)

name: Kirk Wickizer
text: Petz Carlton is far more than a kennel. Mike and Melissa run a top notch daycare for dogs. My wife and I were delighted to discover our Abbey wouldn't spend any time in a cage ! I've met other franchisees and all appeared to have something in common..they LOVE what they do. Absolutely recommend!  Kirk and Peg W.

resp.text: Thanks Kirk!

name: Brandon Rogers
text: Our girl Annie had an absolutely wonderful time at the 5points location of Petz Carlton! We had an absolutely guilt free trip to my cousins wedding in Florida and they treated her like their own with daily photos and updates to us! What a great experience, and her hosts were exceedingly kind and professional! Our little girl came home with a smile on her face and her dog social anxiety basically cured! We will be recommending Petz Carlton to absolutely everyone we know! Thankyou for such a wonderful experience, we are proud to be part of the Petz Carlton pack!!!

resp.text: Thank you for the great review!

name: Mitzi Connell
text: Wonderful service and top-notch wisdom. They know what they're doing and your pets are very well cared for!! AAA++++++++++

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review!

name: Patricia Tomlinson-Long
text: Best place in the world for our Malibu next to home!!! Love love love Petz Carlton- could not recommend them enough!❤

resp.text: Thank you Patty!

name: Amelia Frahm
text: Charleston had such a good time playing at Melissa's, that when he arrived home, he slept all day! We really appreciated the updates via FB and her understanding when we arrived later than expected due to a delayed flight. Definitely recommend The Petz Carlton to other dog owners!

resp.text: Charleston is such a little cutie :) Can't wait to see him again soon!

name: Adam Henry
text: Thank you so much for taking such good care of our Zorro. We enjoyed all the picture and video updates because it showed what a great time he had at the Petz Carlton. That in turn made our vacation all the more pleasant. Zorro is a shelter dog and staying in a home environment with no cages is what he needs. It's not that other boarding places are bad, it's just that he doesn't feel comfortable being caged up. We could tell that he was way more relaxed with Kya, Lily and all the other dogs around. He got to snuggle on the couch and in the bed just like he would at home. We are so glad that we found Petz Carlton. This was the best decision that we could have made for him, and for the first time in 2 years we have been able to go on a trip guilt free. Thank you so much Melissa and Mike for going above and beyond for all your furry clients and their owners and treating them like members of your family. Petz Carlton provides a great service for dog owners and Zorro can’t wait to come back and see his new friend Kya and his favorite girlfriend Lily.

resp.text: Thank you guys for the great review. Hugs to Zorro and Sydney!

name: Douglas Ross
text: Great experience.....Just wish it was a little cheaper when you have 2 dogs.

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 star review! I understand. :) We pride ourselves in quality of care over quantity, therefore it is difficult to have a multiple dog discount in our type of environment versus a traditional kennel. We do provide ways to save and earn free nights to ease the burden. Please check out our referral program in our email campaign and our Free night contests on our Facebook page. Hope that helps and thanks again!

name: Linda Jernigan-Hussong
text: The best pet service in the area. Would not leave my pup's with any one but Petz Carlton

resp.text: Thank you for the great review!

name: Catherine Boykin
text: The Petz Carlton is the best! I have used both Petz Carlton Main and Lanier Lakes, and they both take such great care of my Jake (and my foster dogs when I have one)! Jake is so excited to arrive that he drags me to the door. I love the updates on Facebook, so I can see my pup(s) while I am away and see how much fun is being had by all the dogs. Honestly, I cannot say enough good things about The Petz Carlton!

resp.text: Thank you Catherine!

name: Shannon Rutherford
text: After finding Petz Carlton, we have never boarded  our labradoodle anywhere else.  I love getting the photos updates while we are on vacation. My dog always looks like she is having so much fun with the other dogs and lounging around acting like she owns someone else's home.  We have been using Petz Carlton for several years now and would highly recommend them.

resp.text: Thanks so much for the amazing review! :) :) We are honored to provide Karlee a home away from home!

name: Holly Polston
text: When we stumbled upon Petz Carlton, we knew we'd found exactly what we had been looking for!  GiGi absolutely loves the entire team!  We are so appreciative of Petz Carlton for treating GiGi as if she were their own. They truly care about their clients and our fur babies, and it more than shows.  This is a REAL group of people who are licensed and trained in all aspects of pet care.  They are a loving, caring group of people, and they are simply THE BEST!!  Thank you all a thousand times!

resp.text: Thank you for the great review!

name: Jessica Smith
text:
Petz Carlton (the Lanier Lakes location) offers a wonderful alternative to traditional boarding facilities!!! We rescued a mini dachshund who has some pretty serious separation anxiety issues, but he has stayed with Tatiana and Josh twice now and has had absolutely no problems (I'm actually fairly certain he has more fun there than at home!)

What once was a source of anxiety for me, is now an enjoyable situation for both myself and our dog (they send tons of adorable pictures so you can see how your pup is doing!) I would highly recommend this to anyone looking for a reliable care taker for their dog while they're away.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review!

name: Bill Peterson
text: To me, the biggest thing with leaving your pet for a long period of time, is the confidence and assurance that they will be taken care of in your absence. I always get that when our Toby is at Petz Carlton.

resp.text: Aw. Thank you guys so much for these kind words. We love that mister and can't wait to see him very soon!

name: Deniece Mason
text: Chloe's stay at the Petz Carlton was nothing short ofamazing. When I first entered the home, all of my worries were left at the front door. Melissa and her husband were so nice and I could really tell that they were animal lovers. Chloe hasn't been one to always interact well with other dogs, but this changed as soon as she arrived at the Petz Carlton. Through the daily pictures and video, I could tell she was having the time of her life. This was definitely her home away from home. Thank you Melissa and Petz Carlton for a wonderful experience. We will definitely be back!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review! Chloe is such a sweetie, my Lily absolutely loved her

name: Shannon Kessler
text: Love the fact that my three are taken care of in a home environment by someone who knows dogs and dog behavior - Melissa and Petz Carlton are great!

resp.text: Thanks so much Shannon! Looking forward to seeing your trio again soon!

name: Shama Patel
text:
Melissa took great care of Simba. She sent daily photo updates during Simba's stay. I knew that he was in good hands during my vacation. I highly recommend Melissa to anyone that's looking for a
place for their pets to stay. Shama & Simba (Woof Woof).

resp.text: We love Simba, what a CUTIE! :) Thanks Shama!

name: Cyndi Johnson
text: My dog received the best treatment. All my questions were answered and I felt as though the new vet did a wonderful job! I would see her again! I have never had a bad experience. I highly recommend them to everyone!

name: Mayle Pujol
text: We are new in town....Finding a great veterinarian was important! We had a great experience From the moment we were greeted at front desk to the moment we checked out. I was very concerned about my dog getting sick bc he’s usually healthy. Dr. Brumsky took her time checking Forrest and making sure he got the right meds and dosage. He’s doing better and we are thankful to her and staff.

name: Becky Pounders
text: North Alabama Animal Hospital is outstanding. The love and care they show for the animals they treat is amazing. They care about each one as if it was their own. They have been great with helping our Willow and I wouldn't even imagine taking her anywhere else. I highly recommend this place if you are looking for a place for your fur babies. You will not be disappointed.

name: Sidney Magoon
text: I took my dog, Jethro, there and they were great! The vet was very helpful! He sat on the floor with my dog and was interacting with him to gain his trust so he could look at his ears. I thought that was just awesome! I was also in and out in a timely manner.

name: Christy Shaw
text: We Love NAAH!! They are wonderful, the whole staff!! Our Max Loves going to the vet, his tail starts wagging when we get there, they are really great with all animals!

name: Susan Cole
text: The staff are always so kind and very knowledgeable. Most important, they care about my fur baby.  I lost a kitty last year, and they were so kind and comforting to me during my loss.  In the end, they went above and beyond to help her and without a doubt, she received the best care possible.  I'm thankful for all the staff and will always remember their kindness and dedication to the work they do.  You will feel the same after your first visit.

name: Brenda Lee
text: I got a little crazy when I went to Birmingham and Rocky got worse than he had been and posted a negative remark. It has been taken down. I came home and saw Dr Thompson and we discussed Rocky and options. At one point Rocky could not go outside without coughing. I have been following the plan that was worked out with Dr Thompson and Rocky went out today. He was not coughing and before I could catch him he was across the road checking out girls. Thank you Dr Thompson for giving my dog back his quality of life. We have been out several times and no coughing. We are following the plan.

name: Terri Sassone
text: We are new to the area and changing vets is stressful. Benny's visit was great. He's a special needs senior boy and the vet and staff were awesome. Benny had them trained to give him treats in no time! We will be bringing our other two hooligans in soon!

name: Heath King
text: We started using NAAH after moving to the Shoals area, and our experiences so far have been excellent. We had to make the difficult decision this week to put our dog down after his fight with cancer. We were so pleased with how compassionate, patient, helpful and caring the staff at NAAH were. I would highly recommend North Alabama Animal Hospital to anyone!

name: Lee Renfroe
text: North Alabama Animal Hospital is a very kind, caring practice with high quality veterinarians and staff.  I hold them in very high regard and trust them completely with my pets!  Awesome organization!

name: Janice Smith
text: I trust that everyone at North Alabama Animal Hospital will take excellent care of my pets. They are always competent and compassionate. It is obvious that they love what they do!

name: Laura Hamner
text: North Alabama Animal Hospital does an amazing job caring for our chocolate lab. I would, and do, highly recommend NAAH to anyone who is looking for a team to care for their beloved pet(s). Keep up the good work NAAH.

name: Catie Gajewski
text: The staff was very friendly and the doctor was very thorough getting my leg updated on vaccinations.

name: Vince Brewton
text: Troy and his staff provide great care and treatment. North Alabama Animal Hospital is one of two vet practices in the area we recommend to friends and newcomers. Troy's expertise and experience are outstanding.

name: Emily Parker
text: They have taken care of many of my fur babies over the years. They not only provide great care of the animal but the owner as well. I’ll never forget the horrible day I had to put my Sweetie girl down but I will also never forget the compassion of Dr Youngblood and the techs that day. I highly recommend this office and all the docs!

name: Camilla MIller
text: Everyone was fantastic. So nice and helpful. Thank you for the love you all have for animals. Don't believe you could have made the experience any better!

name: Sandra Johnson
text:
Wonderful  Drs. and staff, they are very patient and caring toward both patients and owners. They really do strive to give the very best care that you could possibly want for your pets at extremely reasonable prices. In my opinion
They are the best in the business. You will never regret taking your babies (pets) to
them.

name: Alison Hawn
text: We are forever grateful to NAAH for all they do to take care of our two babies Max & Okie! They are both high maintenance pups and require a great deal of medical attention. We are always beyond satisfied with the care they receive and the courteous way we are always treated. We truly appreciate everything they do for our babies!

name: tuscaniracer27
text: You guys are always amazing. Your customer service and pet care are top notch. Thank you so much for providing such a great place!

name: Sara Shapiro
text: Dr. Bonner at North Alabama Animal Hospital has provided the best of care for our three dogs. He is professional and is always responsive to their needs.

name: Christy Arnold
text:
What a great team at NAAH!
You all are awesome!
Daisy is happy

name: David Painter
text: I've taken my dogs here for years. I've seen all the doctor's at some point and time. I usually see Adam Thompson; he's very nice and listens to your concerns. I highly recommend all of the doctor's.

name: Cassidy Beck
text: I've been to plenty of vets in the Shoals and I was recommended to come here by a family member and this will be the only vet clinic I use from now on. my cat had a small procedure done & the vet called me personally to tell me that everything went well and took the time to explain what all they did and asked if I had any questions (Ive never had a vet do this before) The receptionists and the other ladies were super nice, too. A great experience.

name: Laura Engdahl
text: I like being able to go in the clinic with my pets. Under the current circumstances- COVID19- I understand why I could not. I think that the curbside process worked quite well. NAAH is a great place to take your pets. Very caring. I’ve been using them over five years. They always get you in when you need to get in. 😻😻😻

name: Rebecca Patterson
text: Excellent care for our senior schnauzer “Sophie”. Not only the normal checkups but an extensive surgery made us feel like they truly care as much as I do.

name: Lisa Morgan
text: Very clean facility. Staff is very professional and pleasant. Atmosphere is very pleasant. My pup loves the staff. They treat him like there own. Would highly recommend my friends and family to this facility.

name: Darcy Williams
text: Dr. Thompson and the rest of the staff always go above and beyond to take care of my kitties and always keep me well informed. I appreciate them so much!

name: John Fisher
text: We brought our dog here at the recommendation of neighbors. Our dog had a cut on one of her paws. At any rate, we were thoroughly impressed by the quality of care and compassion of everyone we met. Highly recommend.

name: Harleigh Houston
text: I honestly couldn’t have asked for a better experience. Y’all were beyond amazing!!

name: Sandi Ayers
text: All the doctors are very competent, knowledgeable and caring.  They are willing to do all they can to help with anything your "family" member needs and they don't forget you either.

name: Jean Goodson
text: The veterinarians at NAAH are simply the absolute best in the area and from my experience in the state.  They are kind and caring to pets and parents and never fail to go the extra mile for our beloved fur babies.  The entire staff from the front desk to the back kennels are unfailingly nice and professional.  These folks are the real deal!

name: Forrest Davis
text: The staff here are incredibly helpful and knowledgeable. They will answer any questions you have about treatments or the health of your pet. You can tell they truly care about keeping your animals healthy and happy.

name: Teresa Box
text: I was so impressed with NAAH! My Crocker Spaniel has finally got relief from a chronic skin condition. We saw the vet Jason Bonner. He was so thorough.  He listened asked questions, gathered his info, examined dog. We talked again and came up with a starting plan. And after 3 days Harley is starting to jump and wanting to play again! #1 Rating in my book

name: Michelle Petty
text: Your staff and Veterinarians have always had my fur babies health a priority. Everyone is always very kind and professional but yet you make patients feel like family.  I’ve had several Veterinarians for my fur babies over the last 20yrs and I must say your office is hands down the very best.  I know you care for mine as you would your very own and that is so comforting especially when at times have to bring in sick and critical babies without your care and explanation of procedures may have turned out not in a good way.  Thank you so much for your continued care for both pet parents and pets

name: Heather Sheppard
text: Everyone at NAAH is wonderful!! I would not trust anyone else to care for my pets!

name: Patricia Dyar
text: The only improvement possible I can think of is not under your control. I’m an owner of a new patient and I have yet to see the inside of your clinic due to COVID-19!  This, too, shall pass!  Very pleased with your handling of the pandemic!

name: Kyla Pearson
text: By far the best vet hands down! My Sassy Frassy Just loves them! I love that they love my baby like she was there’s! Very friendly also and that’s a plus in my book!

name: S Stewart
text:
Appreciate all the NAAH team That took care of Odie.  Great training as well. He goes to get in the crate at home just to rest.
Just amazed at your wonderful therapy throughout Odie’s two surgeries and all that extra care.  And yes includes the crew that gave extra petting, extra trips out to tinkle and more.
Odie really is a great dog.
He had a set back this past Friday night with a hurt right knee. (I’m thinking slept on it wrong).
Dr Troy gave a great assessment and treatment.  He finally is not having to give to it (on Tuesday).
Odie is protecting himself better now. Being very careful.
Thank you Thank You Thankful for ALL of you ⚽️🥏 no more playing chase the squirrels 🐿🐿🐿🐿🐿🐿🐿🐿🐿
(Too expensive a game)

name: Jennifer Warren
text: Fast friendly staff. I was kept informed about everything that was happening and all the options were explained in detail. I would highly recommend North Alabama Animal hospital

name: Melissa Tapp
text: Everyone went above and beyond with our dog Chloe and we were very happy! This was the first time we used North Alabama Animal Hospital and even with having to do curbside check-in due to the Covid-19 issues, everyone was very professional and responsive. Dr. Thompson called me off and on during the visit to discuss treatment and recommendations for Chloe and explained everything in a way we could understand. We will continue to use them for Chloe and for our other pets as well!

name: Caitlyn Brewer
text: They make everything so convenient from making appointments to refilling meds. I brought my fur baby there when my old vet was insisting apoquel was a fix all for my dogs allergies even after I told her it had stopped working. NAAH listening to everything I had to say and helped me look for answers. Now my baby is on Cytapoint and feeling so much better! This dog mamas heart is happy

name: William Cooper
text: Absolutely the best experience I have had with animal care specialists!

name: James Lamar
text:
Had Christmas plans to come to Muscle Shoals to visit my dad and then on to Monroe, LA to visit my son. I sent a message to North Alabama Animal Hospital inquiring about boarding. Dr. Thompson called me and answered all of my questions and even invited me to come to the office for a tour when I got in town.  I took my Cavalier King Charles, Sam, with me for the tour and everyone was so nice. I had no concerns after the visit on what kind of care my Sam would be given. The next day I took Sam in and he stayed 3 nights. When I picked him up there were no issues at all. The staff is great and the rates are very reasonable. I’ll definitely board him there again in the future.

James

name: Michael Richardson
text: Always leave feeling my pets have had the best of care

name: Butch McGee
text: The staff is so very friendly to my pet and I. The curb side service is a safe and smart way to receive care for your pet.  All my questions and concerns were addressed and never felt rushed at all. A great place for pet care

name: Lise Griffin
text: 'When my fur baby has an illness or medical condition, I need someone I can truly trust. That is North Alabama Animal Hospital.

name: Victoria Atkinson
text: I've been bringing my dog hear since 2012. The staff are always pleasant and the doctors as well! They genuinely CARE for the overall health of our fur babies! I recommend this team to anyone who has just become an animal family to those who have had their fur babies.

name: Jay Oliver
text: This is by far the best animal hospital I’ve ever been to. The staff comes out and calls your pets name when it’s there time for the visit. They are always ready to answer any question you may have along the way. 5 star animal hospital.

resp.text: Thanks!

name: Austin Lee
text: The staff was really knowledgeable and friendly. The treated my pet like one of their own

name: Karen Minnelli
text: We have been using North Alabama Animal Hospital for about ten years and could not be more pleased. Each staff member is very professional and obviously loves what they’re doing. It is very clean and the doctors are awesome!  Strongly recommend this facility for all your pet needs!

name: Maps
text: I'm not a local and came into the area for family reasons. I needed a vet to go to and my brother told me to go here. It's the best around he said. I'm biased as I love my vet at home but when I walked in I was impressed just by the looks. Neat, organized and clean with plenty of space for people bringing in their fury family members. Everybody was very friendly... From the staff to the techs and docs.. Even other customers! Great atmosphere. My dog is special to me as she is my medical service dog and I require different methods of care with vets that not a lot will provide. Not here... They were awesome and did everything I asked for and then some. Above and beyond! If I lived in the area, this place would be my only place. If they were where I'm from I would switch in a heartbeat.. Of you love your fury friends then you should be taking them here for care.

name: Heather Butler
text: They're awesome friendly and kind .my dog has an issue with his leg they're so sweet to him

name: Rohan Williams

name: Rebecca Siery
text: I am very pleased with the service provided to Allie. She had gone through a couple of bad experiences at another Vet's office. Although I brought Allie in just for grooming services, I knew she ( and I) would be nervous during her first visit with you. I understand Allie did very well and I attribute it to your team's professionalism. In addition, Allie's coat never felt as clean and soft as it did after your grooming service. Allie will be coming to you for all her needs, including annual vaccinations. Thank you for making Allie's (and my) experience a pleasant one!

resp.text: Thank you so much!

name: Andrew Massey
text: Our Great Dane had somehow impaled herself through the chest and out her back under her arm. We thought she was going to die that night. The Dr.'s stitched her back up and she walked out the door with a limp the next day. 3 days later she is running around like nothing happened. We will always be thankful for them.

name: Craig Keller
text: We trust North Alabama Animal Hospital, the Vets & Staff with the care of our boy, Chappy!  They are great with detailed diagnosis, care instructions and suggestions to improve his life and help us keep him active and healthy.  Fantastic service!! Craig & Cindy K.

name: BCS
text: Highly recommended. Really put my pup and i at ease, even with the initial phone call. If your in the shoals area or can make it to this location please do.

text: Brought my spaniel here while I was in town visiting over the holidays because she was acting sick. They got us in immediately and were very helpful. They were thorough and assured me that if anything changed or if we saw any setback, I could call or bring her back in. I highly recommend them!

name: Stephanie Flanagan
text: I have always had a great experience with my pets at NAAH. I’m open to seeing any vet there because they’re all knowledgeable and show their love for our pets, as well as being honest about why treatments are or are not needed. Thank you NAAH!

name: Cre Thompson

text: North Alabama Animal Hospital has provided exceptional care. The staff and doctors go above and beyond in caring for our furry family members. All of us shook our heads at that one, but with great care for him they found out why he was sick and got him on the road to recovery.  I cannot say enough on how thankful we are to have found North Alabama Animal Hospital.

resp.text: Thank you Tracey! We enjoy the friendship we've made with you and your crew!

Last Thursday Chance had surgery on both eyes:
It's not possible to have a better experience.  The staff and Dr's are always respectful and so nice. They also go over any information needed to know about your pet. Dr. Youngblood recommended numerous things for us and we will be back and using this vet as our primary vet.

text: Awesome Place! The staff is caring and friendly. Great care, Professional and Very Knowledgeable !  I highly Recommend their services! I even got a call back the next day to check on my dog!

text: I had my Great Dane neutered and a Gastroplex surgery completed.  I was very impressed with Dr. Thompson. He is very personal yet professional and took the time to thoroughly explain the procedures and risks. He answered every single question I had and kept me up-to-date on him throughout the two days our furbaby was there. All of the vet techs took fantastic care of our baby and gave him the love, attention, and care I would want him to have. For me personally, as a working mother and responsible pet owner, the hours of operation are very convenient for me and works well with my schedule. I believe this practice deserves all 5 stars!

name: Cindy Eberle
text: NAAH has been taking care of our pup since she was 6 weeks old. Making appointments is easy, we never wait more than a few minutes when we arrive, and the entire staff is outstanding. I wouldn't take Bailey anywhere else.

I feel like my dog receives better care here than I have received at a particular dentist in the area. I will never use another vet!

name: Kelly Haynes
text: We went to get a second opinion on some tumors on my dog's abdomen. He's 14 years old, and our previous vet didn't want to do any anesthesia on him (understandably). BUT - this particular tumor has ruptured, and I think the only fix is surgery. Dr. Thompson was wonderful. His front office staff was awesome and so welcoming. They fit us in the minute I called! The vet tech was so personable, and I could tell she really cared about Madix. We have surgery on the 10th, but they are going to do additional testing before to make sure anesthesia is safe. Top notch vet office, will definitely recommend.

name: Heather Bradford
text: We have used NAAH for seven years now, and recommended them without reservation. We have had three dogs in our family under their care, and had several family members transferred into town who brought their multiple dogs there as well. My dogs have experienced some health issues here and there, some serious, others not, and not a single time has a diagnosis been incorrect or a treatment ineffective (which I realize can happen even under stellar care, but its worth noting). They do not run pricey tests without your go-ahead, but lay it all on the table for you to choose. Also, we drive 70 miles round trip and it is worth it. So, trust your pets to the care there and you will not be disappointed.

name: Norma Brotherton
text: Dr. Youngblood did surgery on our Lucy's knee.  We couldn't be more satisfied and happy with her progress.  Prior to her day of surgery, Dr. Youngblood explained thoroughly each treatment available, and allowed us time to make the decision while we were there. He was so caring to call us immediately before and after her surgery. Thanks to his careful bandaging on her leg, she was able to hobble along the week following surgery without re-injuring her knee.  Her follow-up and physical therapy with Dr. Brumby is going extremely well. After each visit, she is able to use her injured leg a little more.  We definitely recommend Dr. Youngblood and his entire staff.

name: Candace Brown
text: I had to board my 2 dogs over the holiday weekend. I have used 3 other services before, including their vet that offers boarding. Each time my dogs came home crying and nastier than I have ever seen them. Last time my bulldog had a contusion on her eye with no explanation! So we decided to try Pet Palace. We heard great things and I'm so glad we did!! These people truly LOVE animals! (Crazy that that impresses me, but seems like even the vets aren't that enthused with their day job) I feel that they loved on my animals, when I picked them up my Pom wasn't upset, our bully was happy to see me but wasn't frantic. They even washed their bedding!! I paid to have them bathed and nails clipped, again, they did a better job than the vet! I am so happy we found a place we can trust with our animals! The staff was so nice. I felt like I was picking my kids up from a daycare. I feel they really care about the quality of service they give and I will not take my fur babies anywhere else!

name: Tiffany Pitts
text: Today was our second visit to this clinic. We took our new puppy Priscilla in. The assistant was outstanding as she was the first time. She is sure to ask questions on how potty training is going, how feeding times are going and how Priscilla's over all attitude has been and was also able to answer questions we had. The doctor was very quick but when his assistants are trained the way they are and spend the amount of time they do with each patient, I'm ok with the doctor being quick.  All in all, I would recommend this vet clinic to any of my friends and family.

text: I was at the Vet clinic when Scott was there on 10/25/18  Dr. Leonard explained that he could not suture the wounds in question due to the length of time the wounds had been exposed. I also heard him explain cost to this gentleman and his wife. They were going to take the dog to another clinic but could not get the other clinic to answer the phone so they stated they would let Dr. Leonard treat the pet. They also told the staff they did not have alot to spend on their do so they needed to keep the cost down. Dr. Leonard goes above and beyond to explain several ways to treat your pet based on your funds. I have used him for over 15 years and trust him fully with my babies! I recommend him to every one I know!!!!

name: CBowman
text: This is the worst place to take a animal in a emergency, he flat out lied about what he was going to do to take care of our baby and what little bit he did do he did a half way job. We left straight from his office after he charged us a large amount and left our baby in a kennel all day bleeding and suffering we went straight to another vet that tried everything they could to save her and without knowing what all this man had done she talked about the grass and debris she was pulling out of her wounds that he supposedly cleaned. He talks down to the owners of the pets so I hate to think what our girl went through when we left thinking she was going to surgery, she was not given anything for pain she didn't have the first stitch in her and he released her with all her wounds open and bleeding, the other vet spent over 3 hours stitching her up and closing wounds, that's how bad she was and he released her like that, and if you still choose to use the vet you should know his anti inflammatory shot he gives combined with the other two he routinely gives causes ulcers in the stomach or shut the kidneys and liver down. This man is a lier and if it was possible I would give negative stars -*****

name: Rebecca Barkey
text: Valley Vet.. First, the place is kinda dirty, run down and stinks! I went there because its convenient to my home, but after several months of using them, its obvious they care more about making money than about your pets health!! I was already displeased about being talked down to when I asked Dr. Leonard about getting my dogs monthly flea/tick and heartworm meds from an online vendor. He told me it would only save me a few dollars, blah blah... but, he seemed to fail to realize that, they are MY dollars!! 4 months later, after paying about $45 a month for her meds through him, I finally decided to place my order through 1800petmeds and pay $60 for a 3 month supply.  Of course, the Rx has to be authorized by your vet, who we just saw less than 2 months ago and had an appointment to see again on the 17th for her final round of puppy shots and to make an appointment for her to be spayed in the coming weeks. After a week has passed, 1800petmeds has faxed them for approval 3x and I have called twice. Finally, they called my husband to say it'll be $18.50 to approve her prescription, and she will need a $25 heartworm test first??? Regardless of the fact that she's been under his regular care since the day I got her at 6 weeks old. I am switching vets. Like, today!!!! I will not be extorted by a cheap, condescending vet who cares more about making a profit off the meds than about the health of my dog. Also, at her last visit, I had her nails trimmed, it was going right along fine when he got to the 8th toenail and all of a sudden she yelped so loud and totally freaked out and he couldn't finish.. but, of course, he didn't cut or hurt her.. she just suddenly got upset.. after calmly letting him cut the first 7 nails!  The ONLY thing I can say positive I can really say about this place is there's a very nice lady that works there on Tuesdays, who seems to care about pet owners and helping them save money while caring for their fur babies.  I used to interact with her alot with my previous pup, who I lost tragically in April, but I haven't seen her much since I got the new one. I'm not sure of her name, but it wasn't the vet, or his wife, who treats my dog like she's just any old anonymous dog... didn't even bother to write her name on the folder containing all the shots, treatment info she sent home, it's just a blank card with no "pet's name" written in the blank. Same with appointment cards.. to them, she's just any random dog. Convenience isn't everything! Go elsewhere!

On top of that I was able to do Sunday pickup which most places don’t offer, and I it was nice to see how happy my pups were when I picked them up. I could see they enjoyed themselves. I will be using this place again later and the doggy daycare in the future.

name: Sarah Hambric
text: I take both our dogs here. The other day I had to bring my Chihuahua in because he wasn’t feeling good. I called when they opened and they worked him in that morning. They let you know every step of the way what is going on and what they are doing. I even had to bring back urine and fecal samples and they called 30 minutes to an hour after I dropped them off to let me know everything was normal.

name: Jeni Crane
text:
Our family cat was having trouble urinating.  He was not acting himself and he was staying hovered on the litter box.  It was late in the day , close to closing for the clinic.  When I called in the staff was friendly and made room for me on the schedule.  When I got to the clinic the receptionist came to the car masked for the safety of clients. (Covid)  they cared for my cat and kept me informed along the way.   Mufasa our cat had crystals in his urine and a blockage.  They sedated him and took care of the problem.  He was hospitalized over the weekend and the staff and doctor Hankes kept us informed to keep us from worrying.     We now have him home and we have him on special food which for convenience we can buy there when needed.    It's been 5 days and the staff has called to check in to see how mufasa is.  I can not brag enough on how excellent the clinic is run and the loving hearts the staff has.
Bravo!

name: Sir Consumer
text:
Sadly animal care at 'All Creatures Pet Hospital', is not a priority. Today it was clear, $money$ is their priority. My son's Service Dog, needed antibiotics. Dr. Hankes stated he will give my sons dog the antibiotics he needs as he came outside to explain why. Then the itemized bill came out and I was going to be charged almost $50, for the meds!!. This was not a 'gift' as Dr. Hankes stated. The lady stated the Doctor has a bad habit of saying those things. I did not get the antibiotics due to an incredibly, and highly inflated prices. I found the same prescription from GoodRx, for less then $20 that Publix could fill. All Creatures will not send out prescriptions to help animals as I telephoned and was denied this service to help my sons Service Animal.
Although the staff seems very kind. The Vet Dr. Hankes, needs to learn better communication skills and consider helping animals by paying his license to send out prescriptions, if this is the reason. Perhaps there is an unknown underling as to why 'All Creatures Pet Hospital', chooses not to. The high mark up on prices leads me to believe other prices are inflated. Time to look for another more caring animal clinic.

name: Bryan McCullar
text: No way to make All Creatures Pet Hospital better when it’s already the best.  They have adapted to curbside service exceptionally well. While I prefer being in the office, with Akira, you have done an excellent job adapting to Covid.  Your staff is very helpful and do an amazing job.

name: Robert Miller
text: Dr. Ted and his staff are AWESOME!  They really care about your pet and take the time to make sure to answer questions and ensure a quality level of care. They will explain any treatment procedures needed and give you options for you to make an informed decision.  I highly recommend All Creatures, you will not be disappointed.

name: Jules
text: I rushed my dog here after he broke his leg at the Black Creek Dog Park on a Saturday. After they did the X-ray, they told me he would need surgery and they would have to refer him out. I wanted to take him right away, but they assured me no one would be open until Monday. They lied to my face. The office they referred me to (and who they said they work with all the time) is open 24/7. They kept him the entire weekend without giving me any updates, delayed his surgery, and charged me $900 for the unnecessary boarding. My advice is to drive the extra distance and find a reliable vet in Birmingham who won't swindle you.

resp.text:
Wow! We can't believe this review. This review is completely unfair and not honest. Her dog was seen here four months ago. We don't know why she is suddenly writing a review. First, we don't keep pets here just to make money. We did not charge her $900 for boarding. That's just not true. Hospitalization (boarding) was charged for her pet to stay here for two nights at the cost of $108.22, which included administering the pain medication and antibiotics through the weekend. We stayed late to examine, sedate (to eliviate her dogs pain while she was positioned for radiographs), administered intravenous fluids, splinted her leg, and administer pain and antibiotic medications to her dog through the weekend. All treatments that we provided were completed at her request and signature. The charges weren't any different than would have been charged at any other clinic in Birmingham. This client was not our client and she couldn't get in at any other vet in the area late on a Saturday morning just before we closed at noon.

Finally, we could not discharge her pet because he was completely asleep (sedated). It's something that vets just don't do. Bad things can happen when patients aren't kept quiet and still to rest and stabilize while under anesthesia. Also, the liability of someone driving in a hurry down the highway, slamming on their breaks and causing their dog to fly through the air and breaking it's neck is not a smart thing to allow.

Also, our honest experience had been that the surgical center doesn't see patients for routine fractures on the weekend. They are kept hospitalized at a general hospital or at the ER until Monday. The emergency hospital that is associated with the surgical center IS open 24/7 for emergencies throughout the weekend. That is probably the information that the client is referring to. This wasn't an emergency as he wasn't in shock and we had stabilized him on intravenous fluids. We literally called down there today and the technician told us that a bill for observation through the weekend for a dog with a simple fracture on intravenous fluids, antibiotics and pain medications at the emergency hospital would literally approach $2000.

So, we saved this client over $1000, saw her dog when nobody else would, stayed late and provided high quality medicine, and did what was best for her dog.

This review is not honest or accurate and should be removed.

name: Donna Elliott
text: All the staff at All Creatures Pet Hospital are wonderful! They are so helpful, friendly, knowledgeable, professional and best of all they love my furbaby, Paislee, so well that I know she is in the best care.

name: Tabbitha Turnet
text: I couldn’t ask for a better Doctor for my sweet Daisy. She had what I though where allergy issues because of her chewing at her back end.  I took her in to be examined and the staff was very nice and caring. Dr Hankes came out to speak with me after her exam and told me she actually has knee problem which explain the bitting/chewing. He referred surgery to fix the problem but with the financial struggle that covid has caused everyone we just couldn’t do it. We decided to move further with a management plan instead of surgery. He also made it very clear that if in the future we wanted to go ahead with the surgery he himself would do it. I couldn’t ask for a more understanding Vet or more helpful staff. My daisy has been doing much better since we got her on her new medication and is not in anymore pain. We have also started a savings account so we can get the surgery done asap! I would highly recommend this clinic to anyone!

name: Dana HARDEN
text: Will not use again, Mercy Animal hospital is SOOO much better. Wanted to charge a $300 deposit before they even saw my pet.

name: Joyce Wohn
text: Nothing against the clinic I don't like having to wait outside to get results, and as this was my pets first time, I like to met Dr. Otherwise she was better soon after 2 visits and meds. Thank you Joyce Wohn

He even has come to my house to do some farm calls for me to deworm and trim my goats feet. They are very fair on their prices and give us a military discount as well for all of my pets! The bloodwork they did prior to my beatrice's spay was something that i did not think was necessary, but Dr Hankes and his techs explained the reasons why she would need them and we found out she was a diabetic! Im so glad that they caught this in time now she can be treated and she is on the right dietary food that they have there and is doing so much better! We would have not known if he hadn't told us the risks she might be facing during surgery! We love him and all the girls they are the best!
