text: My dog was attacked by a bigger dog at day care. They let the big dogs in with the little dogs. My dog is now scared of larger dogs due to this and had to be treated multiple times my a vet. Will never step foot in the place again or will I allow others that I know to bring there pet there.

name: Hayden Faison
text: Great place to send your dog! Professional and loving staff

name: Deborah Taylor
text: Staff very helpful

name: Lakeshia Dotson
text: I use them for their daycare and overnight boarding. Recently, there customer service has gone down. They are not a friendly staff anymore.

name: Matt Heater
text: Our dogs run from the car to the door to get inside, that says it all.

name: drizzay222
text: My two border collies come home tired and happy!

name: Destiny Oneal
text: We have used Kelley Creek Farms for many years now. Kim always goes above and beyond to accommodate our 4 dogs. I love that each run has their own outdoor space and that the dogs are able to get plenty of energy out in the fenced in yard. When the tornados hit our town and destroyed our fence, Kim was super helpful and accommodated our dogs at the very last minute and kept them until we were able to repair it. I recommend Kelley Creek Farms to everyone I know and I will never use another boarding facility!

resp.text: Thanks Destiny! SO very glad we were able to help you guys out :)

name: Teresa Turner
text: She is such a beautiful person, had healthy animals and pigeons.

resp.text: Wow! Thanks Teresa. I do love my animals. I hope you enjoy the curly birds 😍

name: Niki Rachels
text: Our Marley loves going to Kelley Creek Farms! She has stayed with Kim and Ray several times. They love on Marley like she was one of their own. Every time we get ready to go out of town, I start telling Marley that she is going to the Farm. When we pull up, she gets so excited. I don’t even leash her to take her because as soon as she hops out of our vehicle she runs straight to them! I wouldn’t trust anyone else with our Marley! I love that they send updates about your pet while you are gone. I highly recommend them!

resp.text: Awww.. thanks Niki! Marley is a sweetie. She stays in the "kitchen" with me while I wash dishes. Lol😍

name: Erin Florez
text: After looking for a new place to board our pups, we ran across Kelley Creek. They treated our dogs with the best care and we have already scheduled their next stay! The text updates were unexpected and greatly appreciated! It was great to know my babies were being well taken care of and enjoying their stay. Kim and her husband are top notch!

resp.text: Thanks so much Erin! Looking forward to seeing you guys in a couple of weeks!

name: Karyn Hallman
text: Our dogs love going to Kelley Creek. They have runs where our dogs can go in and out as they please. They are also let into the big run to play a couple times a day. We're so thankful we found this kennel for our pups. Kim has always worked with us and has been great. We love that our dogs have a great place to stay when we're away where the owners treat them like their own.

resp.text: Thanks so much Karyn! We will see you guys soon!😍

name: Beverly Abell
text: Our pups LOVE Kim at Kelly Creek Farms!!!  The kennels are large enough for our two 40 lb and 60 lb furbabies to stay in together and the kennels are climate controlled with a doggy door to their own outdoor area.  Kim kept us updated as often as we liked while they where there.  She genuinely loves all animals and what she does!

resp.text: Thanks Bev! It's so nice to have 2 well loved wonderful pitbulls stay with us. They are proof you should never judge a breed. 😍

name: Taylor Flemion
text: My husband and I use Kelley and Ray for all our dog boarding needs! They even kept them for 3 weeks during our wedding and honeymoon. Our two dogs love it there and we love knowing they are safe and well taken care of. Plus we love the cute pic updates!

resp.text: Thanks Taylor! Piper and Cam are real sweethearts😍

name: Bryan Hallman
text: Absolutely love Kelly Creek Kennels! We have two large dogs and we hate the idea of kenneling them at a place where they are locked in crates or small runs. At KCK they have a large indoor run with a Doggie door to an even larger outside run. They can come and go inside and out as they please. They also get daily playtime in the yard and Kim and Ray send us pictures of them having fun. The indoor area has heat and AC and beds for the dogs. And the surroundings are so peaceful and beautiful. Wouldn’t take our dogs anywhere else.

resp.text: Thanks so much Bryan! We are looking forward to seeing Tucker and Bailey soon!!😍

name: Jessica Legrone
text: Mine and my sisters dogs have stayed at Kelley Creek Farms multiple times and love it! They are very relaxed and happy when they get to go stay there and are just as happy and relaxed when they come home.

resp.text: Thanks Jessica!! We love us some Lady A. and Captain 😀

name: star gray
text: I boarded my English bulldog puppy for the first time.  I looked at several kennels before calling Kelly kennels.  They were so easy to work with and took great care of my puppy.  Kim,one of the owners, was so wonderful and understanding.  She assured me that he would be taken care of.   She and her husband took great care of Danny.  He was happy to see us come back but I feel like he had his own vacation while we were away.  I’m so glad to know that we have a lifelong place to take our Danny and now his little brother too.

resp.text: Thanks so much Star! We loved lovin on Danny Boy while he stayed with us.

name: Amy Merryman
text: We have boarded our dogs with them a couple of times and have had a great experience.  The facility is beautiful and the kennels are very nice and well kept.  Our dogs did not seem at all stressed after being picked up and the owners really seem to love the dogs they care for.  We feel so lucky to have found a place like this so convenient to our home.

resp.text: Thank you Amy!! Toby and Sadie are such gentle giants :)

name: Bethany Wiggins
text: If my family cannot keep my dogs they are the ONLY ones I trust with them! They are amazing! They handle medical emergencies great and love our dogs like we do! It's great to have someone watch your dogs (babies) because they love it, not just to make a dollar.

resp.text: Thank you Bethany!! Emergencies scare us to death but so thankful things turned out good for Goose!!

text: Having just moved to the area, we weren’t sure where to board our two huskies - we are so glad we found Kelley Creek! It’s the ideal setting and our pups were so well cared for (and with text updates, so were we!). Bubbles and Ziggy loved their stay, and we can feel good about leaving them in good, loving hands.

resp.text: Thanks Gina! We love Ziggy and Bubs and looking forward to their visit this weekend :)

text: Called the number attached to the website and the women that answered was extremely rude overall. I had called to ask how young they bored because I have a puppy and her response was “Well I’m not going to nurse them or anything” very rudely. Very unprofessional.

name: LaTesha Gardner
text: Kim and her husband are attentive and have such sweet spirits! We'll be repeat customers!

name: Landon K

resp.text: Thanks Landon! We love keeping Rocky for you guys :-)

name: Glenda Norris

Love love love this place!!

name: Robert Schmid

name: Kenneth Chambers

name: Kitty C

Their indoor play areas are better than the average due to the flooring. My dogs paw pads are not all scratched up because he is playing not playing on a concrete floor! The people working there are very kind and I have no reservations regarding leaving my dog family member there! Thank you Happy Tails! You live up to your name!!

name: Amy S.

It is such a well thought-out facility and accommodates all the furbabies that come in! They take such great care of all three of our boys and we are so grateful! They also have awesome hours!!

My friend has used their boarding services several times and highly recommends them!

name: Natalie Vann
text: Animal loving staff and knows our Stella by name like she is their own. Love them!

name: Elise Bray
text: We cannot say enough great things about Happy Tails, Megan, Page and Aly!  We were coming into Smith Lake and wanted to board our dogs Radar and Bandit for the week.. I called another boarding place in Cullman before speaking with Megan and Page and hands down, their time and care in speaking to us about their facility and what they offered for our dogs sealed the deal to come here.  Our dogs stayed a week, made doggie friends (a pug named Frankie!), got in our car and fell right to sleep.  We come to visit family down here 2x a year and we will be boarding our pups here from now on.  If I could give Happy Tails 100+ gold stars I would. name: Allison Kerber
text: I love happy tails. I wouldn't board my dogs anywhere else

name: Robby Culver
text: Wonderful place to have your dogs groomed and boarding also. The staff is very helpful  the place is clean and they really love the animals they take care of

name: Dixie Richter
text: They always take excellent care of our dogs while we travel

name: Bill Niblett
text: Great people that know how to treat dogs great.

name: Christy Hicks
text: They do a great job on our Lily and Lucy!!

name: AJ Kinney
text: When your dog doesn't really want to leave, you know you have found a good place. Will absolutely be back and would recommend this facility to everyone! Our dogs were well cared for and loved and I couldn't ask for anything else.

name: Sloane Thompson
text: They always do a great job with my sweet Annie a 15 year old aussie

name: Kim Stricklin
text: Absolutely the best for grooming or boarding! Staff is excellent! Beautiful and extremely CLEAN facility! My fur babies love it too!❤

name: Nicole Lawrence
text: We are at the beach and a few days in I received pics and a report on Piper. It absolutely made my son’s day to know while he was having fun so was his best friend. Love love love Happy Tails! Beautiful place and staff are amazing! It honestly feels like you are sending your favorite four legged family member on a vacation while you go on one.

name: Connie Sparman
text: Love this place. My big boy want stay with just anyone. He loves going to Happy Tails.

name: William Porter
text: Best pet care I have ever used in any state or county I have lived in my 67 years.

name: Sandy Stricklin
text: Friendly, caring staff. They did a good job cutting hair and nails. I felt good about leaving my little dog there to be groomed.

name: James Speer
text: Great job clipping claws an bath 😊

name: Angie Morris
text: My pup truly enjoyed her stay! The staff was awesome, friendly and helpful! Very clean facility, best around in my opinion!

name: Marilyn Jennings
text: They let our 2 Shih Tzus play in play area instead of being caged. Nice friendly professionals & always do a great job on both doggies.

name: Marie Johnson
text: This was by far the worst experience I have ever had with a doggy daycare. My dogs and I were moving and had been traveling a great deal. They were stressed and in a new environment. I needed to run errands to get things switched on at new house. A staff member rudely told me that there were no spots available for my dogs because they were too loud with their barking. I will never attempt to go there and I will not recommend them to anyone!

name: Dawn Henson
text: Cleanest boarding facility I have ever seen. Friendly staff. They were happy to give me a tour. Answered all my questions. They have pick up hours on Sunday.

name: Susan Eldred
text: Charlie likes going there.  They do a great job grooming.

name: Ray Thompson
text: Rigby loves getting his groom there!!! Their great! Treat him like their own!!!

name: Gary Harper
text: Brought my Boogie in they did a great job with the grooming. He was also the happiest poochy ever too. I think they spoil them. First class Folks!

name: Raquel Freeman
text: Wonderful staff that genuinely loves your dog and makes them smell so good. 10 out of 10 would recommend.

name: Tammie Stanley
text: They take great care of my dog and he enjoys going.

name: Alex Dickey
text: They took excellent care of our cat and dog while we were away.

name: Cindy Dyer
text: Love this place! And, they love my dog and take great care of her!

name: John Leonardi
text:
They take care of our Yorkie. She's very happy to go there. I got no complaints, love the whole staff.

Since they so are busy and hard to get her in we have booked Sophia for the whole year.

name: Bonnie Martin
text: Today must have been mini Schnauzer day.  All being received with smiling faces and eager to assist.  Will report on grooming afterwards.

name: Nicholas May
text: Quincy came out looking fly! All the neighborhood dogs are jealous of her new cut.

name: Randy Nelson
text:
Thanks so much my dog,s came back HAPPY!!!!!
RANDY&JAMIE NELSON

name: Janie Hedge
text: Love the staff! The facility is awesome!

name: Rhonda Morgan
text: My girls look awesome 🌟

name: Kari Osborne
text:
By far, one of the best places around to entrust with your furbaby. Ms. Paige and her staff take wonderful care of them and offer grooming, boarding, and even doggie daycare. Their new facility is absolutely beautiful, and has both indoor and outdoor play areas!

My 10-year old furbaby use to despise having to be boarded at our local vet in Birmingham, but I swear I have to pry him away from all the fun he has at Happy Tails. He absolutely loves getting to play with all the other furbabies, and even has his own spacious room to take a snooze.  We 💕 Happy Tails.

name: David Watson
text: Lovely groomer, completely satisfied with the groom, and Bella was so thrilled when I picked her up

name: donna gilley
text: Loved the cut on my fur baby

name: Erin Hutchens
text: The sweetest girls ever, My babies, and I, are always at ease 💓

name: Victoria Sports
text: Very friendly and prompt.

name: Tim Pierce
text: Very nice.

name: Ray Bowen
text: Good for your dog

name: Lisa Roberts
text: Not happy

name: Stephen Shaw
text: Dogs love it...

name: JoEllen Clowers
text: Very Good

name: stevenh
text: They are the best

name: Flora Mae Fulgham
text: They were awesome. My dog has never been away from me for more than a night, she was there 5 nights.  I'm grateful for the people that work there they were amazing.

name: Keila Morse
text: So far so good.  We take Hermes twice a week for half day and they are very accommodating to our schedule.   No issues, good experience. He loves when we pull up to Helena Dog House.  He gets so excited.

name: Alan Farmer
text: These guys are the best! They literraly sat with my German Shepherd, who wouldn't eat, and fed him by hand. The best boarder in the area by far and the only place we'll leave our boy.

name: BILL SMOKE
text: My dog seems to love them and that says it all!

name: Greg Warden
text: Clean facility, friendly staff and most importantly, my dog loves it!

name: Toby TenHarmsel
text: Great service. Always good to our pooch.

name: dennis stapleton
text: Our Dog Loves Going Here.

name: MsIndy Red
text: Boarded for 4 days.  He came home with poop on his bed, blanket, everything.  He's very well housebroken, so this tells me that he either wasn't going out often enough or wasn't given enough time to finish the job when he was out.  I also don't like that the "yard" is common gravel ... Like they just put a fence up around an old parking lot.  It should be grass, turf, outdoor carpet, something that's not a safety hazard.  I seriously doubt I'll try them again, but he came home alive, so there's that.  What they do have going for them are the reasonable rates.  It's nigh impossible to find an affordable place in this area, but price shouldn't justify quality of care.  Amenities perhaps, but not basics.  I also like that the "houses" are wood instead of cages.  On the other hand, the wood gets chewed on sometimes and I can see that being a safety hazard, too. The place has potential, but needs some real improvements.

name: redheaded stepchild
text: We take Dapper Dave to Ms. Emily of Emily's Furtastic located inside Helena Dog House. She is the most talented and patient groomer we've ever had. 5 stars to her. We've also used the boarding facilities which are outstanding. Everyone at Helena Dog House loves animals and offers services to care for, entertain and more. Highly recommend.

name: Brett Minter
text: We have used them twice so far, for daycare and for overnight boarding. Both times they were excellent. Of course I can't see what's going on when they are there and I'm out of town but our dogs are always in great spirits and seem to have been very well cared for when we come back. These guys really seem to care about our fur babies. We will keep coming back.

name: Teresa Herbert
text: So disappointed! I explained that my 9 month old Schipperkee lived with 2 older rescues and they didn’t want to play with him. After 1/2 day there the report I received was surprising to say the least from trained staff. The owner wrote “he was a bully” really , he’s a puppy !!! I brought for socializing!!!!!  If this is what they offer , no thanks. The outside was also cheaply done with large rocks and not a real play area. Very very disappointed, will not take my baby back. Since then the many people I work with recommended elsewhere, that this little championship blood line is playing with others as a puppy ♥️

name: Dena
text: Always great experience!! Taking our dog tomorrow to stay for a week...excellent grooming!!

name: André Garcia
text: They are amazing!!!! We use them for boarding and grooming.

name: Collins Batchelor
text: Nice layout. Good grooming available.

name: Tammy Evans
text: Love the staff at Helena Dog House. Boarding and grooming are great! Our pup likes going and actually gets excited when she sees where we are!

name: Jordan Holt
text: they are awesome folks, love the large houses the dogs go in. Their in house trainer, Palmer, does a great job and really understands dogs. As long as you actually listen to his advice I think he could train any pup!

name: Bryan Singer
text:
It's a great place and they really seem to care about the dogs.  My only concern is that their price is high compared to other options nearby.  For example, my dog would be over $40/night for a kennel.  But they do take them out to socialize  a lot.

At my vet just a few minutes away, it is $22/day and $5/day for them to be in doggie day care.

I keep Helena Dog House as a backup if I dont have other options... if they were priced similar or same as my other options, I would likely use them as primary go to for boarding.

name: Tammy Strange
text: Love the Helena Dog House! Our dogs get excited when we pull into the parking lot.

name: Joey Smith
text: Great service and care.

name: Dominick Rintrona
text: Awesome place

name: Mildred Lutz
text: Ok

name: Dj Drought
text: Great people

name: Jeffrey Coykendall
text: We used to board with the vet but the animals are much happier here. Rebecca is so sweet and helpful. Worth the drive.

name: Mandy Hughey
text: First time I boarded my great Dane was here. I cannot say enough about this lady and her facility. I was so pleased with the care her received. Rebecca has an awesome place to board. She tries to make it as homey as possible for her customers. I highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you! We loved having your big (BIG) baby lol...He was such a sweetie!

name: Dianne Douglas
text:
A great find to care for my dogs when needed instead of caged at the vet & exposed to illnesses from patients who come to the vet!

Very nice & ‘homey’. Dogs have a little vacation instead of ‘being boarded’. She takes great care of them, like they are all her own pets!!!

She is often full to capacity, especially around holidays, etc! Need to call & make reservations! Go by there & check it out & you’ll understand why!!!

Costs a bit more than vet boarding, but my animals aren’t Bored! Love my dogs & it’s well worth the little bit of extra money!!!

They’re happy when I pick them up, but not stressed & eager to see me to “get out of here”! HIGHLY Recommended!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words :)

name: Corey Stewart
text:
A little out of the way, this cute little pet boarding facility is amazing! Montevallo Doghouse + Cats has a separate boarding area for small dogs is like a small hotel, complete with a bed and a door to a private fenced courtyard. However, separate small dog boarding is limited. Call early before holidays.

In addition, the playground and extra attention to the pets sets this boarding facility apart!

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave such a kind review! We enjoyed your sweet girl's visit with us!

name: Rick James
text:
Would like to stop and thank Rebecca for all her help on the phone with me. She was kind and very informative on pricing, even let me walk around the facility. The rooms are more than enough for your pets and the amount of care given is above and beyond what I could have asked for. I was away overseas for 2 weeks and my 2 furry kids had a blast. I was even given email updates which adds peace of mind especially when I'm so far away.

To anyone looking to board your dogs or cats I highly recommend this facility. I personally wouldn't keep my pets anywhere else!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the thoughtful review. We are glad the pups had a good time! Love the photo! He is such a big baby :)

name: Stella Huckstep
text: My boxers love it there.  They seem to know anytime we head that way and get so excited.  Hands down, the best boarder I have ever used.  I recommend them to everyone I know that needs to board their dogs.

resp.text: Thank you! They are so sweet. We love having your girls visit!

name: Dee Shafer
text: We love Montebello Dog house. Ms Rebecca is always professional and kind. Our boys Jaxson and Loki are always well cared for, when they get home it's time to sleep for a day or two because they are played out. We had bad experiences with boarding our babies in the past but never here.  Thank you for the love and attention you give to our boys. Awesomeness!!!

resp.text: Thank you! We enjoy having Loki and Jaxson visit and appreciate y'all trusting us with your sweet boys. <3

name: Sammy Self
text: Boarded our 3 doggies this past Thursday & picked them up Sunday. Great place. Very pleased. Even gave me a Senior Citizen discount. Wasn’t expecting that❤️

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review! We enjoyed meeting the pups and we look forward to seeing them again soon!

name: Tim Brewer (jugglertim)
text: Absolutely the best place to board your dog. Out of the way, but your dog gets so much more room and attention than anywhere else!

resp.text: Thank you! We love having her!

name: Adam Buddenbohn
text: We have used Montebello Doghouse 8 times over the last 1.5 years for trips ranging from a weekend to 2.5 weeks. Hands down they are the best place we have ever boarded out two dogs. They love it! They get to stay in a room together with inside and outside access as they please. Plus there is a huge outside play area that is securely fenced for them to run around in. I love that the dog house is a family run place too. My wife and I feel much better leaving our dogs with them as opposed to in a vet where they have a 4x4 concrete cage to stay in. Keep up the good work!

resp.text: Aw, thank you! You have the sweetest pups. We appreciate y'all taking the time to leave a review.

name: Michelle Coggins
text: This is as close to home as I've found to leave your dog for a week.  The set-up of the rooms is awesome with their own little patio and yard.  You can tell that the owners truly love the animals.  You are leaving your pet in very good hands.  If you are overprotective (like me) and want to call and check on your beloved pet, the owners will gladly fill you in on how his/her stay is going.  I strongly recommend this place!

name: Leslie Schwartz
text: More like doggie retreat camp, than a kennel!  Happy dogs when you pick them up like they actually enjoyed themselves and thoughtful staff that treat them well while you are out town.  The indoor /outdoor kennels with a view of the woods are very nice and the fuzzy covers and cots are  very nice, they are cared for with love and care. Highly recommended!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words and taking time to leave a review. We enjoy having him :)

name: Heather Taylor
text: They took excellent care of our dog. We will definitely be back the next time we have to board him.

resp.text: Thank you! We had fun!

name: Derrick Mendez
text: Great experience!  My wife loved the webcam that allows you to check in on your pets while away.

resp.text: Thank you! We are glad they enjoyed their stay!

name: Mariana Gruschow
text: We have been boarding our furry kids with Rebecca for almost three years now, she's the best! They always come back home happy! She makes them feel at home :)

resp.text: Thank you for letting us care for them. They are all so sweet and fun...and very fluffy!  We love having them!   :)

name: Jessica
text:
We drive from Northport so that our dog can stay here. I know my dog, Gambit, is safe here and he seems to always have a good time.

"Fun place, but they don't give me all the treats I want so I only give it one paw up."
-Gambit

resp.text: Thank you! And that sounds like Gambit! (..and if you left your computer unattended I have no doubt he would hack it and order them online ;)

name: Molly Hindman
text: Absolutely could not recommend this place more! They love our doggies like their very own. We've been sending our fur babies there for 7 years now with only great experiences!

resp.text: Thank you so much! It is our pleasure to have them stay with us!

name: Buster Lowery
text: Super nice staff. The dogs love it there

resp.text: Thank you! We had fun!

name: Molly Hindman
text: Absolutely could not recommend this place more! They love our doggies like their very own. We've been sending our fur babies there for 7 years now with only great experiences!

resp.text: Thank you so much! It is our pleasure to have them stay with us!

name: koby posey
text: Very nice staff. Super management. Can only be hopeful for future growth

resp.text: Wow, thank you!

name: Mary Sartain
text:
I took my Lucy there for the first time because of the great reviews.  I had only made reservations for one night but Lucy had to stay for two due to unexpected work hours and Ms. Rebecca was more than accommodating.  She provided food for her since I did not pack enough.

When I arrived, Ms. Rebecca gave me a tour of the place and I was impressed.  Every dog had their own little room with a doggie door to the outside.  They even get one on one activity time with Ms. Rebecca.

Every time I take Lucy to the vet for day boarding, she cannot wait to go home. When I picked her up today, she did NOT want to leave. My feelings were hurt :( .....LOL!!  When I finally got her in the car, she jumped out when I turned my back to her wanting to stay. I was so happy to Lucy happy.   I now have peace of mind that when I need to board Lucy, she will only to go to Ms. Rebecca's knowing that is where Lucy will be well taken of.  Ms. Rebecca truly loves and cares for our babies.

resp.text: Thank you! We enjoyed having her!

name: Simon Carbone
text:
This place is great - Rusty really takes great care of my dog River. I learned about this place from some friends a couple months ago and River has stayed there 3 times now for up to three nights. She loves it there! The last time i went, i left her blanket and when I picked it her up Rusty had washed and dried her blanket (she probably made a mess...)

My dog is a senior and they are very sweet to her. She gets to romp around the big yard without a leash and she also has her own little private yard so she has some privacy as well.

She'll definitely stay here whenever I have to leave town from now on.

resp.text: Thank you!  River is so sweet and we love having her.

name: David Porter
text: I don't know what we would do if Rebecca and Rusty were not in business. I guess never travel. Our 3 babies seem to enjoy being away from Mom and Dad and staying at Montevallo Doghouse.

resp.text: Thank you! We enjoy having them!

name: Zachary Crothers
text: This is the best housing facility around. They are reasonably priced and take good care of the puppies.

resp.text: Thank you! We love having the your very busy, bouncy puppy squad!

name: Kelly H2O
text:
If I could give this place a 20 star I would. Rebecca and Rusty are amazing people. They are so kind and sweet to the animals (and humans too).  Their facility is so clean I would stay there.  It's truly out of this world. I have been bringing my 4 dogs there for several years and know a few other people who won't bring their dogs anywhere else . The dogs and cat's don't stay in cages, they stay in little rooms with storm doors and the dog rooms have a little door at the back so they can go outside to their own private yard. In the winter there are heaters for each room that lower from the ceiling so dogs aren't cold. the cats have the cat trees in them so they'll have a place to curl up that's cozy and comfy.
The reviewer who said that it looks like they live near a bunch of meth addicts is ignorant.  The road to the Montevallo Doghouse does have mobile homes along it but most are well kept. That customer is so rude to assume that all people who live in mobile homes are addicts.   I have never had a problem with Rusty or Rebecca not being there and I've taken my dogs there many times through the years.  They are wonderful people.

name: J Sanders
text: Awesome place. Mousse and Rocky love it.

resp.text: Thank you! We love having them!

name: kljgreene
text: I boarded my two dachshunds here for 5 days, I was referred here by a co worker, I was very happy with the facility. I love that they didn't go into a cage & they had access to the outside. The facility is in nature surrounded by trees. The dogs aren't "caged" ....Our family went out of town for a few days and boarded them at our vet...we picked them up upon returning from our trip....one of my dogs had a cracked tooth and scraped and raw nose from apparently trying to bite his way out of the caged kennel. Never again will they go there. Planning a vacation and altho montevello is a far it's well worth knowing my dogs are in good hands, more like a doggie camp.

name: Landon K
text: My dog seems to like this place and the owners are really nice. We have been taking our boxer there for several years.

resp.text: Thank you! It is greatly appreciated. We really enjoy what we do. :)

name: Lisa Bryan
text:
We have Boarded our 2 labs here many times!! And were highly Pleased with the excellent care Bo and Sadie received! From, Rusty and Rebecca and Justin, their son too! So VERY polite and Loving to our precious puppys!! Tho, both our Puppys are sad when we drop them off!!?? They quickly adjust to their room...with the clear door!! And we Know that our black lab LOVES the constant access to their Own Private outside dog run!! During the Summer months the rooms have A/C in each one and in cool weather, there's a heater above them! Which is wonderful for our Puppys! Cuz they're surely to get into Trouble if a heater were near the floor!! Justin learned quickly! LOL! That our spoiled puppys were Very Used to Being Inside in the A/C!! When we had to extend a recent trip for another day and night!!? They were GREAT accommodating Our Needs...and Making Room for Bo and Sadie!! But they were outside ...in the Shade of coarse! But, Justin said that They Both were Over-Joyed!! When their Indoor room came open!! He explained that They BOTH were hilarious!! They're simply Spoiled Rotten....poor babies had to hang in the Shade for an hour or so!? Just 2 1/2 yrs ago...they both stayed outside except overnight and in bad weather!! LOL! And this most Recent visit last month....Rebecca described our Puppys...like She'd known them both for Years!! Telling me what Each of them did on their Nature Walks!!?? And she described Exactly how both Bo and Sadie ACT....& each of their mannerisms!!? MADE ME....KNOW FOR SURE THAT "SHE" HAD ACTUALLY SPENT ONE ON ONE ""TIME"" WITH THEM BOTH!!!❤ This last visit they stayed 6 nights in a room together!! Which is PERFECT!! And it was a mere $200!! They are a bit far away for us....cuz we live in Helena. But it really Not too bad a drive...at all, and the more we drive it ....the closer it seems! We Also use Montevallo Animal Clinic...for All our Furry Babies....our Puppys and Kitty's! So it's about maybe 8 minutes from there!! They've ALSO...worked with us when we Needed Later Drop off after normal hours!! Quite a few times! And as I said accommodated us having to Add an extra day & night!! THEY'VE JUST BEEN WONDERFUL FOR OUR PUPPYS!!❤ Makes Us NOT BE WORRYING ABOUT OUR BABIES EHILE WE'RE AWAY FROM HOME!!

LISA BRYAN....HELENA,AL...

name: Hannah Payne
text: Very clean,  very well kept,  very caring.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind review! Its hard work to provide and it nice to know it's noticed  :)

name: Suzanne Hutchinson
text: Clean, spacious, friendly conscientious staff

resp.text: Thank you!

name: cindy HOLSOMBECK
text: Rebecca and Rusty are the best!!!

resp.text: Thank you! Tell Georgia and Tiger we said "hi!"

name: Debbie Boothe
text: You will too check it out for yourself!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Justina Tillman
text: The doctor was fantastic and took his time with us and our pet. He really made us much more comfortable with our very difficult situation. He certainly knows how to care for fur babies and their worried mom and dad. A wonderful place that does more than just care for animals... everyone at Golden Animal Hospital was incredible!!

name: Michelle Risenhoover
text: Dr.Golden is the BEST! He truly cares about his patients and their families! I appreciate him and all his help so much

resp.text: Michelle thank you so much for your kind review and for trusting Dr. Golden and Golden Animal Hospital for all your pets needs!

name: B. Morgan
text:
I was new at this vet but I was impressed on first visit
I plan to return.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your great review!

name: Pamela Pruett
text: They always take care of my fur babies very well

resp.text: Thank You

name: Doug Carnes
text: Great people ! Clean and just a great atmosphere. Thank y'all !

resp.text: Doug thank you for taking the time to leave a great review! We very much appreciate the feedback and we are so happy to hear of your great experience!

name: cheryl stanaland
text: Love Dr. Harbin and Dr. Golden! Everyone is so nice there and always takes such great care of my 2 dogs and cat❤❤❤

name: Ark Haight
text: Nice people good service

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words!

name: Philip Lerner
text: Doctor golden and his staff are phenomenal. I would not use anybody else.

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us a review. We are delighted to hear of your positive experience!

name: Clay Cole
text: Great Vets and assistants that care about your pets and you

name: Angela Hamilton
text: Dr. Golden has proven that his clinic is a first class facility. I had an issue yesterday he called me that night himself to get the facts. Not only did he listen he took care of the issue right away. I’m more than satisfied and grateful that the issue was taking care of thank you Dr. Golden and by the way I met your mom today.

name: Amanda Patel
text: Wonderful Staff, my dog Maggie loves this place. But, we missed her bi-annual check up and when I called to schedule it they took her right in no problems and time friendly when I went to pay I asked about the certificate of rabies shot (the whole reason we went) and they said that they did not it because she's not due till her annual exam, when I asked when that was she said in months, she then said I could have waited and got everything done at once for a little over $100 instead I know have to pay twice. My husband was not happy about this, we are on a very strict budget and knowing that I could have done everything at once for the price of one trip, that just didn't settle well with us.

name: Stephanie Wingard
text: We've been bring our dog here for almost nine years. We really like Dr. Golden as well as the other doctors who have done her yearly check ups, shots, and in times when our Lucy wasn't feeling good. The girls working at the front desk are always professional, cheerful, and are so very helpful  with scheduling appointments or whatever we need. Our Lucy is always treated well and they go out of their way to see to it that she is well cared for.  We also have her groomed here too. Michelle does a great job and she always looks and smells so good. I know that she must treat Lucy well because Lucy doesn't freak out when she goes from my arms to her's. I would recommend Golden Animals Hospital.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words and for taking the time to leave us feedback! We are so happy to hear that you and Lucy enjoy coming to see us! We always strive to make it a positive experience for our clients and our patients!

name: Lisa Johnston
text: All wonderful and pet- loving people!

resp.text: Thank you very much for your great review!

name: Pamela Roberts
text: I absolutely love Dr. Tom Harbin! He is the best vet and I actually will drive from Florida to bring my dogs to him if there is anything serious that I can't trust someone else with.  His background is with the excellent Blue Pearl Vet Group, which I am very familiar with, since my dog had to go for specialized treatment in Atlanta.  He is very caring and takes the time to show it and address all your concerns. After surgeries, they actually hold your pet until they are able to wake up and walk around. That made me feel like my pet is important and they care about them and me and it's not just another dog getting surgery or more money in a practice's pocket. I highly recommend him and all the staff I have met there.

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave a review! We are so happy to hear about your great experience with us!

name: Brian Elebash
text: Great place to take your pets. Dr Golden cares about your pet like it's his. Could not ask for a better animal hospital. Thank you Dr. Golden.

resp.text: Thank You Brian

name: Felecia McMillan
text: It was wonderful. I brought my niece who hopes to work there some day.

resp.text: Thank You

name: Jessica Perry
text: I have been taking my 2 pups here for years one being an English bulldog so we need things frequently. The staff and doctors are all very professional and accommodating. We have worked with Dr. Golden and Dr. Chandler and they are so caring and take the time to educate you and come up with a plan best for you and your pup. Also, their new system for ordering medications online is very convenient when we can't get by the clinic.

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking your time to write such kind words! We truly appreciate your business and enjoy taking care of your pets!!

name: Duhdardar
text: very good people extremely kind and they took good care of my puppy Adler they will be my place to go from now on.

resp.text: Thank You

name: Elizabeth Morzuch
text: Dr. Golden is simply the best. I have never encountered such a great, friendly, (pet, human, and toddler) veterinarian before. This man, and by the way his employees operate, is clearly passionate and an expert in his field and customer service. We were only in the area for a short time, but by the time spent and way he interacted with me and my family,  you would think we were long time clients  - or, his family - he cares that much.  The only downside to this experience is that we knew it wasn't forever as our lives keep us constantly moving. I was heartbroken that we had to leave the area. Golden Animal Hospital is just top-notch.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words!!  We take great pride in treating our pet parents and pet patients like family!!!

name: Timothy Dozier
text: Love the new place ... It's amazing and the staff is fantastic . Dr Golden is above and beyond at all times !

resp.text: Thank You

name: Bobbie Speziale
text: I like doing business in pike Road. Good  staff and good vets  that informs you on yours animals well being

resp.text: Thank you so much for your 5 star review and for leaving feedback! We are so delighted to hear of your positive experience!

text: The doctors and staff of Golden Animal Hospital East are caring, compassionate, and always available to answer questions and give advice.  They have treated our kitty cats for years, and we recommend them to anyone with absolutely no reservations.

name: Kati Ballard
text:
My dog got out of my yard and run over by a car a few weeks ago.. and because of the amazing people at Golden Animal Hospital, I have my girl back home and healing well! The love for my furbaby that these people showed is out of this world. From Jamie texting me to just check in, to Dr. Harbin who took her home with him to be sure she made it through the night. I have cried tears of sadness and joy with the staff at Golden and would highly recommend them to anyone looking for a vets office that will treat you and your babies as family.
Thank you again to everyone at Golden for making it possible for me to still have my Sookah ❤🐶

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review!  We are thrilled with Sookah’s recovery and look forward to seeing her sweet face for many more years to come!!!

name: Qingfeng Chen
text:
(Translated by Google) I wonder if you remember iris? Yesterday, her amniotic fluid broke at about 1:35 pm. We called you around 5:30 pm to find out if her condition is normal. Your doctor is very sure to tell us not to worry. It will be around 1:30 in the evening. It ’s been 12 hours. When I called your doctor again and left a phone number for us, we called for a long time before contacting your doctor, but he still said everything was normal. He only helped to find the contact method of the pet emergency room, but during the two prenatal inspections of iris before, we twice asked you to help us find a contact method for the emergency room. You said that even if there is a problem, you can do it at night Calling you, you also have an emergency room at night, saying that she will have no problems with the second production. Even if there is a problem, you can help me at night. I believe you, because Iris has been here to check with you . But last night when we needed you most, I took a long time to contact you. I also thank you for helping me find the emergency room contact method at the end, but just when we were going to see the emergency department When Iris left us, I always wondered why during the two prenatal check-ups, we asked for an emergency room contact method. You only gave me your outpatient phone number, and I remember I told you that It ’s just that Iris can contact the doctor who can help her when the 1% you said needs the doctor ’s help. You said you can help her even at night, but when Iris needs the doctor ’s help most, where are you , Did you know that because we spent the time to rescue her in the most urgent time, if you can help me find the emergency room contact method, at least Iris still has the hope of survival, and May continue to be with us. Do you know that iris is like our daughter in our hearts? Do you know how helpless we are when we watch iris walk away in front of us? I want to ask you Where is the night emergency? I want to ask if your commitment is really so worth mentioning? Iris just had her two-year-old birthday last month. She is still so young, and the baby in her stomach has a total of 9 lives. Just say that it is gone? ?

(Original)
不知道你们还记得iris吗？昨天1:35pm左右她的羊水破了，在5:30pm左右我们打电话给你们，想要了解她的情况是不是正常，你们医生很确定的告诉我们不用担心，等到了晚上1:30左右已经12个小时了当我再一次打给你们医生留个我的电话号码我们打了好几久才联系到你们的医生，但是他还是说一切正常，那时我们已经非常的担心的说了iris的状况下，他才帮忙找宠物急诊室的联系方法，但是在之前iris的两次产前检查的时候，我们两次要求你们帮我们找一个急诊室的联系方法，你们说就算有问题在晚上也可以打电话给你们，你们也有晚上急诊，说她是第二次生产不会有问题的，就算有问题你们也可以帮到我在晚上的时候，我相信你们，因为iris一直到在你们这里检查的。但是在昨晚我们最需要你们的时候，我却花了很长的时间来联系到你们，我也感谢你在最后的时候帮我找到了急诊室的联系方法，但是就在我们准备去看急诊的时候，iris离开了我们，我一直想不明白为什么在两次产前检查的时候，我们要求要一个急诊室的联系方法，你们只给我你们门诊的电话号码，我也记得我告诉你们我只是为了iris在那个你说的1%需要医生帮忙的时候可以及时的联系到可以帮助她的医生，你说你们就算晚上也能帮助她，但是在iris最需要医生的帮助的时候，你们在哪里，你们知不知道就因为在最紧急的时候我们却把救她的时间花在寻找你们，如果当初你们能帮我找到急诊室的联系方法，最起码iris还有还有生还的希望，还有可能继续陪着我们，你们知不知道iris在我们心里就像我们的女儿一样，你们知不知道当我们看着iris在我们面前走掉的时候，我们有多么的无助，我想问一下你们的夜间急诊在哪里？我想问一下你们的承诺真的那么的不值一提吗？iris上个月才刚刚过完两岁生日，她还那么的年轻，还有她肚子的宝宝一共9个生命就这样说没就没了？？

text: I have boarded my Schnauzers here several times over the years and have always been extremely happy with them! I love this place!!

name: Corrine Steding
text:
I have utilized the services of Paws and Claws, for years for our three dogs, and was always very pleased with the care that they recieved while in the care of Ms. Sandy.
I do realize, that the New Management, following Ms. Sandy, left more than just a little to be desired, but that only speaks volumes to me as to the quality of Ms. Sandy’s work.
It is unparalleled.
Her genuine love for the animals is astounding.
No pun intended, but Sandy works like a dog to take care of the animals entrusted to her, and I know this first hand.
I am so thankful that Ms. Sandy has returned to us, and I would encourage all residents to support her business, by donating any old towels you no longer need, paper towels, laundry products, dog food etc. For anyone who is in aware, Miss Sandy not only runs a kennel for our fur babies, she also runs a rescue for homeless ones as well.
Let’s show her our love, and help her, in any way that we can, to insure that this precious woman is able to carry on her excellent work.
She didn’t just leave paws and claws in the hands of those who were not capable,
she came back to restore quality to her establishment!
So please, let’s all lend our support, and encouragement.
God bless you Ms. Sandy, and thank you for all that you do.

name: Chris Hoover
text: Used them many times over the years. Always had great service and have never once worried about the care my dogs were receiving while they were there. Great staff and amenities..

name: Sarah Bailey
text: I boarded my dog here for three days and came back to find that they did not know where she was. If she didn't have a GPS tracker attached to her collar for me to find her (she has escaped my yard in the past and they were aware that she digs), I would have no idea where she was (across the highway about half a mile up the road). Consider somewhere else to board your pets.

name: Annie Lyons
text: Sandy is back! And this place is awesome again. They take excellent care of my fur baby when I must be away.

text: Great place to keep your pets , very reliable. Thanks

text: I would not suggest using this place. My dog stayed there and I had dropped off his own bed to put in his room. When I picked him up they had no idea where any of his stuff was so I just left without it. They also had a lot of young children handling the dogs there and my dog doesn't do well with kids so I was a nervous wreck. It just didn't seem like a professional place. I would try Branchville Animal Hospital across the street.

name: Donna Bowman
text: I worked there and i would never leave my fur baby there..  They don't get took out like the owner says.. The middle wing had no air and she charged all the customers full price and never told them there fur babies wouldn't be in the air conditioning.. Poor business..

text: Kenzy an snooki always come home happy so I know they get treated well on their stay there

name: T Johnson
text:
I picked my dog up yesterday, 6/20/16 from Paws N Claws in Odenville, AL. after a 9 day stay and was told he had the runs. I've been leaving him there almost 8 years and this has never happened before. I had to get up with him in the middle of the night. ***This business has been bought and is under new management!!!  It would have been nice to know this prior to my dog's stay. I drive from B'ham to Odenville because I trusted the former owner and her business. I'm not so sure about these new owners. They never once inquired about whether my dog was up to date with his shots. That's probably one reason he was sick when I picked him up. Who knows if the other dogs are up to date with their shots.  I called at 7:20 am this morning to inquire as to how long my dog was sick before I picked him up. The new owner, Tony, was going to check with his wife and call me back. It's 3:30pm and I have not heard from Tony. I took my pet to the doctor. They are treating him with antibiotics and probiotics. I'm going to be looking for somewhere else to board my pet.

Beware, you have been warned.

text:
Awesome place for doggie daycare, grooming, and overnight kenneling.
Our doodle goes here once per week and it’s his favorite place on earth.
Great rates on day care. Grooming rates competitive w other places and super convenient as he lives to go there.
Nice and friendly staff. Curb side pick up during Covid.
Never had any issues.

name: Chris Parsons
text: Their the best and most importantly my picky little dog loves them too!

name: Ruth
text: I just picked up my dog this morning after boarding for 4 nights and a bath.  I moved 30 minutes away and still board him here when I travel.  He always comes back happy and healthy.   He has special needs (he's deaf) and they take good care of him.  They even send photos when I ask them to.  He's not stacked in a cage, either.  Another place I looked at did that and while they charged a little less, I'll gladly pay more (still reasonable) to have him comfortable and happy.  He even enjoys play time (he's not the most social dog either so that says a lot).  I started coming here based on a friend's personal knowledge of the facility and of the owner, and I'm glad I listened.  Blue Sky takes good care of my dog. One final note: I strongly object to the person who gave one star because of their grooming hours.  Really?  That was a mean thing to do.  Their hours are fine and they truly care about the dogs and their reputation.

name: June Bennett
text: We feel very comfortable leaving our two small dogs to board at Blue Sky.  They love playing with the other little dogs and all the personal attention they get from the staff. I'm a nervous 'mommy' but no matter how trivial my concerns might seem,  we always get a prompt and reassuring response....plus they smell so good from their baths they get just before we pick them up. We highly recommend Blue Sky Pet Spa!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words! We love Ziva and Gibbs! They act totally at home during their stays with us. Sweet babies who love us as much as we love them. ❤️🐾

text: Take great care of my Doodle and he is happy when I drop him off

text: My dog always comes from Blue Sky Pet Spa looking AMAZING! Their customer service is personalized to my needs and wonderful. I would not go anywhere else!

name: Fred Arce
text: Great place to pamper your dogs where they are always well cared for.

name: Lizz Ford
text: The service here is exceptional! They are knowledgeable and patient. I have only been coming for a few months(since aug) and I have not been disappointed! Even when my furbaby was less than “perfect “ they worked with him and ensured all was well with him. I highly recommend this place for all your furbaby’s grooming needs!

name: L Milligan
text: With Blue Sky Pet Spa it's never too late to get your fur baby on a grooming plan. I brought my 4 year old Shih Tzu for his first professional grooming and the staff was phenomenal! He adjusted well and came out looking like a star! No doubt, we are regulars now - I definately recommend Blue Sky Pet Spa, we had the best experience!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words! We enjoyed watching little Shadow become more relaxed with us at the morning progressed. We look forward to his future visits.☺️🐾

name: Alex Maxwell
text: We have been incredibly impressed with Blue Sky Pet Spa. Our golden doodle, Bentley, comes out happy, confident, and I am sometimes dumbfounded with how good he looks compared to when I brought him in. The staff is very professional, kind, and receptive to his particular needs. When we first came in, they educated us (as many doodle owners fail to research) on the necessary grooming needs of the breed. I had been brushing him every 1-2 days before BSPS only to find out that I had been using the wrong brush and wrong techniques. The poor guy used to cower when I got the brush out. Now, with the help of BSPS, he loves getting brushed and we are on a 4-5 week scheduled groom. I know from this fact that they use the utmost care when grooming him. Very thankful to have this place and looking forward to more visits here.

resp.text: Thank you Alex, so much for the kind words, and taking the time to write such a nice review. We very much enjoy having Bentley at the spa. He is a perfect representative of his breed, and a proper gentlemen. We love our doodles, and even more, appreciate the pet parents who take the time to learn about their chosen breed. We are so happy that you found us! We look forward to future visits as well. ☺️🐾

name: Julie Knowles
text: I shared with Janet the special need of my sweet angel that other groomers swore to meet and failed. Janet assured me that my little angel, Lola, would be taken care of based on the needs I had shared with her. Unlike any groomer I have used previously, she made sure that my baby got the specific service I asked for. This means so much to my husband and myself. We have brought her home from "hair appointments" in the past and you could just see how miserable she was. When I brought her home today she pranced around like a princess. Thank you Janet and Blue Sky Pet Spa... you are awesome!!!!!!

resp.text:
Julie,
Thank you so much for the kind words. We enjoyed seeing you and sweet Lola again, as well as Tank, the cutest little dachshund guy!
We look forward to your next visit ☺️🐾❤️

name: Patrick Falgout
text: Brought our 8 week old puppies for their first visit. They loved them and didn't want to let them come home. Everyone loves a new puppy. :)

name: Donnette Putman
text: They do a nice job on my pup. Waited in line and watched 4 persons in front of me get comments on their dogs behavior but no word on mine. Curious.. PetSmart always said he was a perfect little gentleman.

name: Andrea Kellar
text: I bring my dog here for nail trims; Blue Sky gets 5 stars for that. The service is fast and friendly plus they take walk ins. They're great with my nervous little old guy and the price is so low that I can take him as often as he needs.

name: Sherry Farmer
text: It's not often, 1-2 times a year, but when I go out of town this is where I board my little dog. He's older, nervous, but he's treated special & I can leave town with confidence that he's treated well. I only have to text my dates I will be out of town & I get confirmation of the reservation right away. He's given his own separate area, healthy treats, (I bring his own food). Techs take all the dogs out to potty, even do a late night potty break at 10pm. Everything is included, no extra charge for the potty break. Other places I've called give the dogs 3 breaks & charge for any extra! They will bathe & groom my dog with special products if I ask for a nominal fee. Great place!

resp.text: Sherry, thank you so much for the kind words! We’re so glad that you are happy with our services.  We love to take care of your little guy☺️☺️

name: kaden goodell
text: Took our horribly matted dog (😬 Sorry Daisy Mae) and turned her back into the pretty Maltipoo we forgot she could be. They did a fantastic job.

name: B E
text: Great service! Well worth the money!! They are great with long haired dogs! My lhasa also and Pomeranian love them!

text: I am very protective of my two Dachshunds, Duke and Lillie. We have found Blue Sky Pet Spa to be impeccable in every aspect of their business from scheduling, grooming to boarding. I highly recommend their professional services. Duke and Lillie give them two paws up!

name: ruthann Parks

This is my SuzyQ's Favorite Spa in the whole wide world. 😇☺ It is also my Favorite place for her. I know she will get lots of lovin and much respect there. She has a wonderful play day then comes home all Sassy , clean & smellin ummm so fresh and clean. Not to strong, but just perfect.
She has been a frequent flyer for @ 6 years❤❤🐾🐾👏👏☺

name: Kay H
text: I took my toy poodle in for a grooming. This was our first time using Blue Sky and they were great. My dog had a horrible summer due to my being busy with work and school and it showed in his matted coat. She took really great care of him and when I picked him up, he looked wonderful. They have a nice, clean facility and I recommend it to anyone wanting their dogs to be treated great. I will definitely use her again. She also had a lot of big dogs come in when I visited so I will also take my boxer / pitt mix.

name: Raven Bogart
text: Great experience! I brought in pictures of how I wanted my Shih tzu's (Cora) hair cut. I was nervous to try a new groomer since the mess-up that happened at a previous groomer...chopped off my pups top knot and made it into a puppy cut!). Staff at Blue Sky reassured me and explained options for hair maintenance products for her type of coat. They walked me through the whole facility and showed me all the grooming and boarding areas and met the staff. Everyone was friendly and very helpful! I have already recommended my friends and neighbors in Madison to use Blue Sky Pet Spa, and I have two more appointments already set up for the upcoming weeks! I'm excited to bring my long haired cat to be groomed at Blue Sky Pet Spa soon!

name: Clarissa Harrold
text: My boy always looks good when he's groomed here.

name: Farron Davis
text: Their motto is "kind hearts, caring hands". They really hold true to it.

name: Chad Hunter
text: The best in Madison and hunstville.

name: Kathryn Witek
text: Overpriced not worth the inflated prices.

resp.text: This woman is a disgruntled former employee who was with the spa for less than 4 weeks and was let go. She has never been a client. She is stalking us on social media and will be receiving a cease and desist letter from our attorney. We always strive to price our work fairly, and are always ready and willing to explain to actual clients how we arrive at the grooming fee. Please give us a call or message us on FB for a wonderful customer service experience

name: Marie L
text:
I don't know how this place gets such good reviews, as they NEVER answer their phone, so you can't make an appointment.
I tried for 3 days to get ahold of them, and everytime I called I got the answering machine.  I left several messages and only got one phonecall back which I missed, but I called them back within minutes and again, got the answering machine!  Needless to say, I took my business elsewhere.
I recommend Tabby's Pet Salon...they did an excellent job (and they are also cheaper than this place)!!

text: I tried them after seeing the billboard on 69 south. They answered, gathered my info and was prompt to call me back to schedule my grooming appointment. Hannah was thorough to go over any concerns, questions, and issues with grooming. She was polite, and took extra time since our pups were timid. AJ got a tie and smelled so good, I even bought the blueberry spray they used. The facility was clean and well taken care of.

text: I can't say enough about the people at West Alabama Dog Grooming and Hannah they are the most professional service in the general area and I recommend them to everyone around this area of west central Alabama!

resp.text: Thanks for sharing your experience! We look forward to seeing you again!

name: Proloy Deb
text:
There is no other way to express my review other than "The best dog boarding in and around Tuscaloosa". Our fur babies have been to several dog boarding in the past and we have always noticed that they were stressful once they were collected from the boarding. We did not know the reason until after they were kept at the West Alabama Dog Boarding and Grooming. This is probably because of the carelessness toward the dogs at other boarding. However, this is the only place where I saw our babies were genuinely happy. The owners of this place seem to be very loving/caring to all the dogs. Moreover, the owners of this place kept sending pictures of our fur babies every morning which added to our peace of mind while we were away from our babies. Our babies were also very clean and happy when we collected them. Thank you West Alabama Dog Boarding & Grooming, we had our trip to Florida without any worries because of you. We will highly recommend them to anyone looking for a short term or long term boarding.

Cheers,
Proloy and Kerline

resp.text: We’re thrilled to hear you & your fur babies enjoyed your experience with us! We hope to serve you again in the future!

text: I was about to book this place until I saw that they do not board pit pulls.  We have a pit bull that is a big ball of love.  I think any business that discriminates against pit bulls, or any other breed for that matter, deserves a terrible review so I felt the need to express that here.

resp.text: We are sorry you were having a bad day, Mr. George, but as anyone who knows us can tell you, we are not the sort of business you are portraying us to be.  We wish all the best for you and your dog.

Never take your animal here

name: Darlene Rembert
text: Ms. Pam does a great job grooming my dog, Drew.  She has boarded him at her state of the art kennel, as well. And if you get your pet groomed, she offers one free night of boarding, if you board within 30 days.  I completely trust her with my pet and know that she takes really good care of him.  He loves her as well.  I recommend her to anyone who wants to take advantage of her love of animals and expert grooming.  She also has a pet sitting service that I plan to take advantage of.

name: Nikki Rowell
text: I've been using Dirty Dog Saloon for the past 4 years and I Love It!! The quality of her work and just the love and care she shows my dog is rare. Its hard to find a place that grooms and boards your pet and the pet is always glad to see them or wants to go with them. This, to me, confirms that she truly loves and cares for my pet when she is in her care. Dirty Dog is hands down the BEST facility around and I would highly recommend them to ANYONE that truly loves their pet the way I love mine!!

name: F. A. Brown, Sr.
text: Ms. Pam is a Rock Star! She gave our girls, Jacy and Juno the a Royal Custom Cut!. We LoveLoveLove Her! I recommend her to the World!

text: Highly recommend! ALWAYS THERE FOR ME when we need (that need is to know my fur babies are well cared for) and Pam LOVES each and every one that walks through her door! Clean convenient and a lovable environment.

text: I have been using Pam since 2007 and absolutely love her.  She really cares about each and every pet that comes through her shop. I highly recommend her to anyone.

text: Pam is a true professional passionate about her animals,fair prices kennels are spacious  animals are not in cages. If you love your pet let Pam do the grooming.She also picksup and delivery service for grooming. and offers pet sitting.

text: I'm very unsatisfied with the service I was given. The owner was very short and honestly rude when I explained to her how I wanted my fur baby groomed. She had him from 10am-2pm. He did not smell that great when I picked him up and the worst thing of all she completely butchered his haircut. She left him so uneven it is ridiculous! His haircut basically looks like she cut his fur with her eyes closed!! I would advise everyone to take your fur baby some where else with better customer service and quality!

name: Don Thomas
text: Great job on my dog

name: Aubie9 Chic
text: Dogs were traumatized when they left. You are not allowed to come in the shop, she brings the animals to the fence for you to pick up. It's in her words because of liability but in every grooming shop I've ever been in you go inside. My advise if you can't see where and what conditions your babies will be in just don't do it.

name: Gabriel T
text: I had to go out of town, and couldnt take my dog with me, Pam was very helpful and inmediately connected with my dog, who is a brat. The place was clean and the mood was perfect for my nervous dog. Great place around the Birmingham area to take your pets to!

name: Ed Jennings
text: Took my Yorkie and my Sheltie to Pam two weeks ago. Asked her to only trim paws, ears and butt on my Sheltie.  She trimmed the whole coat!  My Yorkie was basically untouched,  except for her back and her anal area was badly bruised and skinned with deep cuts from the clippers. She still has black bruises and large scabs.  I'm so angry, I haven't decided what to do.  My husband has taken my furbabies in the past to Pam, but I went with him this time.  The yard was nasty and smelled of feces. I would advise no one to go to her shop!

name: Barbara Hicks
text:
I have been having my Bichon Frise groomed with Pam Drexler since April 2014.
I had a bad experience with my former groomer and lost my long time groomer to marriage and moving far away.  I met Pam in Pet Smart and she was so friendly, so when I needed a groomer I called her.  She has been grooming Casper ever since.  She is a very caring, loving groomer to all dogs.   Bichon's are very tedious to shape, blow out and make fluffy. Casper loves his bath and Spa day.  An excellent caring place to take care of your four legged children.

name: Denise Wilkes
text: I was so pleased by the clinic! I called to ask about some symptoms my dog was having and they were able to see him right away. Within 20 minutes they had diagnosed him and prescribed medicine and I am so happy to say he is doing significantly better! The team were very friendly and professional yet you could see their compassion for animals. I am happy we chose them as our service provider!

name: LMFW
text:
I took my pupdog Angel there. Found out she's allergic to fleas. EVEEYBODY that helped me and Angel were amazing. Super friendly and understanding. When I went there my pupdog had chewed all the fur off her butt and back and everywhere. Maybe 3 weeks after the visit my pupdog looks WAYYYY more healthy!! Thank you everyone there! God bless y'all!

P.s I MEAN LOOK AT THIS SMILING PUPDOG AND TELL ME SHE DOESN'T FEEL BETTER! HAHAHA

name: Jessica Sears
text: I took my 14 year old dog to Helena Vet and I gotta say I have never met a better team. Janet came in greeted us and immediately loved on my baby. She was so personable and caring! She spoke to me like a person and not just another number. She truly cared for my baby. I will definitely recommend Helena Vet to all of my friends from now on!!!

name: Rhonda Syphurs
text: Everyone was great! Very friendly  staff.  Loved Dr Barnette.  She went out of her way to explain every aspect of care and treatment. Office atmosphere was very cheerful and helpful. Prices were fair. Good location. Will be back!

name: Marsha Graham
text: Helena Vet Clinic has been taking care of my dog, Lola, for many years. I am very pleased with their service. They are professional and caring. Everything I need to know about my dog’s health is carefully explained to me. I highly recommend them for your pet care needs. Both vets are very knowledgeable and caring. Everyone in the office is so nice and very helpful from the front office to the groomer to the vet techs. My dog and I have had nothing but excellent experiences and wonderful care from Helena Vet Clinic. ❤️

name: Liz Jarrell
text: I moved here from Kentucky I have 12 year old lab name Lukey they were so great with him and me. They explain everything with you and you have questions they are there to help. The staff and doctors are wonderful and friendly they me welcome and like they knew me all our lives. Now my little ole man has cancer and they have been wonderful if I have question or concerns after hours they would respond. Luke and I so blessed for have them in our lives.i highly recommend the staff and doctors. We love you all.

name: Zac Reed
text: I’ve had my golden doodle puppy Mosby in there for his 3rd and 4th rounds of shots and it has been a great experience. Efficient, friendly, helpful, and affordable.

name: Alexa Hargreave
text:
We absolutely LOVE Helena Vet Clinic. Our young cats have had several visits in the last year. Two of the visits were for serious issues. We have only had Dr. Stephens as our doctor the times we've been there. Dr. Stephens is incredible.
How he communicates, and truly loves our babies is priceless. Also, very professional and informative. Reception is always very kind, and patient. These folks truly love our fur babies.

name: Danielle Langdon
text: They have been great both times I have taken my pittie in.  Janet gets us right in on the days I request. They will take great care of your babies. Highly recommend.

name: Susann McWhorter
text: Doctors and staff are TRULY animal lovers! Each person shows compassionate patience with my dog. All are very professional and pleasant! Have used this clinic for years and wouldn’t consider any other!

name: Jenna
text:
Wow! I came here for the first time today with my senior dog. We decided to change vets since we moved to the area. The receptionist, vet tech, and vet were WONDERFUL. I have never been to a place where they showed this much care, patience, and attention to my pet.
The staff is young, but don't let that throw you off. Your fur baby will be very much cared for here. I will absolutely be making this my go-to place.

name: Allison Dunbar
text: The staff was amazing! My dog was injured by another dog and needed to have her jaw wired back together as well at stitches and other treatment. Janet kept me informed throughout the whole process and I rested well knowing Dixie was in good hands! They got her fixed up and she is back home resting well.

name: Anna Jacobs
text: The doctors here are really knowledgeable and caring. It’s obvious they are passionate about taking care of patients. I never feel like I’m being overcharged, and I feel safe bringing my pets here. The reception staff is always incredibly friendly! I think it’s amazing the steps they’re taking to keep themselves and the general public safe by abiding by COVID—19 restrictions and keeping it to curbside service only. Thank you so much for all you guys do!

name: Chad 395
text: Best experience I’ve had at a vet clinic. Making an appointment was quick and easy. The staff was extremely kind and ensured all of my questions and were answered and my pup’s visit was explained thoroughly. Dr Allison was great. Very happy I chose this clinic for my new puppy!

name: MichelleJosesph Booth
text: They called me Scott for some reason I think they have me mixed up with somebody else! My name is Joseph and they did a great job with Saban  our dog. Pretty sure they’re going to remain our vet. The vet was very personable and professional and told us everything she did.

name: Deanna Chandler
text: Dr. Barrett is fantastic! She was super tentative and was extremely thorough. She answered all my questions happily

name: April Mason
text: I have been taking all my fur babies to Helena Vet. Clinic for a good long while.  They treat me and my babies like we are one of their families.  I can't say enough about this place.

name: dustin Norris
text: I have used this clinic for over 20 years and always been extremely pleased with my service and care...to me and my pets. Excellent place to take your fur babies and Excellent people taking care of them.

name: Angel Gilly
text: Polite, professional, knowledgeable, and caring staff provided excellent treatment for my cat Archie Waffles while calming me and thoroughly explaining what was happening and what could and should happen in the future. Highly recommend.

name: Tracey Bowen
text: I brought two of my dogs for nail trims and check a hot spot on the tail of my other dog. The doctors and techs are wonderful! However my one dog, avalanche, had two toes that were bleeding from his nail trim. I’m hoping the medicine I was given for my other dog, Keelin, for her alopecia works for her tail.

name: Marc and Karen Werner
text: We have boarded both of our dogs and most recently had them groomed and their semi annual check ups. 1 of our 2 cats that we rescued was showing symptoms of what we thought was allergies, but turned out to be a virus that was quickly found and treated within only a few minutes. The vet called us and explained everything in detail and answered all the questions that we had about treatment of both cats (since they were rescued together). Pricing is extremely fair and the staff is great!

name: Misty Doles-Busic
text: Very happy to find a veterinarian near our home in Helena that is professional, responsive, and good with our fur babies.

name: Kevin Stober
text: All the people at Helena Veterinary Clinic are professional, friendly, and caring about animals. It's very easy to get an appointment and their hours make it possible to drop off and pick up even if you have a busy work schedule. Their prices are very fair for the quality of service for your pet. They are my go to place for my dog (Coco)!

name: Amanda Counts
text: We changed vets after over 25 years and came to Helena Vet. The office manager helped me with getting out 3 dogs records from our previous vet and arranged our pets visits. During the vet visit the Doctor was on the phone with me the entire time (during COVID) - explained everything including the cost for each test and medication. She answered all of my questions honestly and was great to explain everything. My dog suffers from allergies and previously we were not taken very seriously and told to give large doses of Benadryl even though I explained that does not work for her anymore- it never really did. The most vital part was that she helped me with a treatment plan for my dog. At the end of the visit #1 I was not surprised by the bill- she discussed all that with me as we spoke and #2 I knew the all of the next steps. That was a big deal because where we were before I never had a treatment plan and basically we started over every time we came in. The next day Lucy’s skin was not red, hot, and irritated, she wasn’t chewing on her paws and shaking her head, she wasn’t panting and stressing her and everyone around her out. she was relaxed and calm, and sleeping so peacefully- that hasn’t happened in 8 years for her. The doctor even called me back to go over all of her blood work results. I have never been more impressed with a veterinarian clinic. I am actually a little embarrassed that I continued taking my dogs to the previous vet all these years- had I known the level of service that we were missing and the expertise these doctors offer in comparison to what we had grown accustomed to, I would have moved them many years ago. I look forward to many years of quality care for my dogs.

name: Kay Guess
text: Dr. Barnett and the staff at Helena Veterinary Clinic are always so easy to work with and have such compassion for the animals they care for. They explain everything fully, and you leave knowing exactly how to take care of your pet when you get home. Very thankful to have them in Helena!

name: Samuel Monte
text: My dogs always enjoy the visit and so do I. Doctors and staff do a great job.

resp.text: Thanks for sharing your thoughts! We value your feedback & recommendation to other pet owners.

name: Todd Morris
text: The entire staff is extremely professional and caring. My dog loves going there and I highly recommend them.

name: Debra McWilliams
text: Everyone that works there takes such good care of my pups!  Drs, Barnett and Stephens are thorough and explain everything.

name: Samuel Monte
text: My dogs always enjoy the visit and so do I. Doctors and staff do a great job.
